texts.en: Suraji is a new customer. He is 35 years old, married with four children and he trades coffee. He applied for a loan of UGX 1,000,000 to improve his farming business. He has the challenge of low business turnover from his farming and low market purchases, so he decided to come to UGAFODE for a loan to increase his manpower and expand both his farmland and his agriculture. In the photograph is Suraji (center), his wife and the UGAFODE credit officer.

loans.use: To hire manpower for his farm

loans.name: Samaritan Group (B)

texts.en:
Twelve mothers from the same school joined hands and formed the Samaritan Group (B). The tireless, determined and loving mothers strive hard to give the best to their family and kids. They live in a village and most of them are cultivators and weavers. Nenghoi, the featured borrower member for the group, appears in the photo with her son. Both of them are raising their hands.

“Sending kids to school makes me happy,” says Nenghoi. "They work harder and stronger when they score good grades."  She and her husband are cultivators and generate income by selling their produce from the paddy fields and vegetable farms. The income is irregular and not reliable for monthly expenditures including school fees and other necessary expenses. At the beginning of the year, they usually take a loan from moneylenders to meet their educational expenses. Paying the monthly interest and saving money to repay the capital prevents them from paying the monthly school fees on time.

With the help of the Kiva education loan, she will pay for her son's school admission fees, textbooks & stationary, other annual examination fees and necessary expenses. She says, “Thank you so much Kiva."  She shares one of the group member's delightful experiences and says that her friend is expressionless with the Kiva education loan entitlement for her twins. Her twins took the education loan and both of them are in school.
 
The rest of the group members will also pay for their kids' educational expenses and will repay the loan on time. They all say, “Thank-you Kiva”.

loans.use: To pay for school fees, supplies and other annual educational expenses

loans.name: Ketty

texts.en:
Ketty is a married woman who hails from a rural area in Kabingo, Isingiro District. She is aged 38 and has three children. She lost both her parents when she was 16 years old, and she was staying with her grandmother until she got married at the age of 20 years. 

She got married to a man who also had a humble background, and because of such harsh conditions, they were forced to start up a small business dealing in general merchandise. It has grown with the support of loans from Ugafode, and they are now requesting 2,000,000 Uganda shillings to finish their house so that their children can be accommodated decently. They also hope this will improve their status in the community in which they are living, since the current one has really been such a reproach to them.

loans.use: To buy building materials

loans.name: Rizwana's Group

texts.en:
Rizwana is a 61-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her two sons and a daughter. Her children are doing study. 

Rizwana has been running her own business, selling clothes for three years. She needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk, but due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these clothes. 

Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva group loan with another member from BRAC Pakistan. With this loan, she will purchase the clothes inventory to resell and earn income to manage her household. She also plans to make savings with her income, so that she can meet uncertain expenses in the future.

Rizwana is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of clothes to resell.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en su propia casa en el distrito de Nueva Arica, una comunidad pequeña, donde su `población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la compra y venta de animales de corral patos, cerdos, gallinas entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de adobes y cemento para cercar los corrales de sus animales y de esta manera tenerlo mejor distribuidos, logrando un mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maribel is 35 years old and lives with her husband in their own home in the District of Nueva Arica. The people in this small community engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This area is located in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Maribel buys and sells domesticated animals such as ducks, pigs, chickens, and other livestock. Her business is located in an area behind her house. She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,000 PEN so that she can buy adobe and cement for building animal pens. This will improve her production and distribution of animals that she offers to her customers.

loans.use: to buy adobe and cement for building animal pens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to receive necessary medicine, drugs, and treatment.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a married woman. She has two children who are three and six years old. She operates a grocery store where she sells sugarcane, tomatoes, cabbages and other groceries. She also owns a farm where she grows crops. Her business is located in a rural area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the poor weather. She will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and other farm inputs to enable her to farm more land. She hopes that in the future, she will own large tracts of land. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and other farm inputs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mangos, apples, melons, snack foods, beverages, bread, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for necessary medicine and treatment

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary. a widowed mother of four,  describes herself as humble and respectful. For seven years now she has been operating a retail business selling sugar, soap, milk, maize flour, wheat flour, washing soap, cooking oil and other household goods. Her enterprise is located in a strategic location with plenty of customers, most of whom are local residents. Her biggest challenge is the high cost of goods. 

Mary will use this Kes 100,000 loan to buy more sugar, soap, milk, wheat flour, maize flour and other items for resale. This will be her third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans of KES 20,000 and 50,000 have been repaid. Mary's goal is to be a supplier of consumer goods within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a healthy life.

loans.use: buy more sugar, soap, milk, wheat flour, maize flour and other items

loans.name: Blanca Libia

texts.es:
Blanca, a sus 59 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora y pujante, cabeza de hogar desde que tuvo que enfrentar el difícil momento del fallecimiento de su esposo, quedando a cargo de solventar todos los gastos del hogar.
Desde hace 20 años, se dedica a trabajar en la confección a terceros, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, su taller se encuentra ubicado en un espacio de su casa, allí trabaja sola todos los días pero, cuando tiene muchos contratos de producción, emplea a otra persona.
Con el apoyo del crédito que solicita, podrá comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, entre otros), para poder cumplir con la producción que tiene pendiente y así poder aumentar sus ventas e ingresos.
Blanca manifiesta que su principal propósito es seguir fortaleciendo su negocio, ampliarlo y así poder cumplir el sueño de generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de hogar de su comunidad, pues con ello, podrá mejorar la calidad de vida propia y la de las demás personas que influyan en su labor.
texts.en:
Blanca, at 59 years of age, is a hard working and strong woman who has been head of the household since she had to face the difficult moment when her husband died, leaving her in charge of paying the family bills.

For twenty years, she has been dedicated to making clothing for third parties, a job she learned by example. Her shop is located in a space in her house. There she works alone every day but when she has a lot of production contracts she employs another person.

With the support of the loan she is requesting, she will be able to buy resources at wholesale (fabric, thread, buttons, among other things) to be able to finish the production that is pending and thus be able to expand her sales and income.

Blanca says that her main goal is to keep strengthening her business, expand it and thus be able to achieve her dream of generating new opportunities of employment for heads of household in her community, since with that she will be able to improve her own quality of life and that of other people who influence her work.

loans.use: to buy resources at wholesale (fabric, thread, buttons, among other things).

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is a 42-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of three daughters. Her husband is doing a job at a private limited company and is responsible for feeding the entire family. Asma has been running a beauty salon for five years and adds her income to her husband's income to manage the household.
 
Asma has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase different kinds of cosmetics and other accessories like combs, creams, lotions, nail polish remover, etc for her parlor business. This loan will help her to increase her income and enable her to save for the future needs of her family.

Asma is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different types of cosmetics and other items for her beauty salon

loans.name: Takhmina

texts.ru:
Тахмина является уроженкой города Худжанд. Ей 31 год. Она имеет высшее образование, мужа и двоих детей школьного возраста.
В 2004 году Тахмина открыла свой торговый бизнес. Вот уже 10 лет как она на рынке города занимается торговлей и продает в основном полотенца большие и маленькие, постельное белье, одеяла и т.д. Она научилась торговой деятельности у своего отца. Тахмина привозит только качественные товары и поэтому имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Торговая точка, на которой Тахмина ведет данную деятельность, арендуется ею. Каждый год она производит оплату за аренду за год вперед. В этом году в связи с финансовыми трудностями она не смогла самостоятельно оплатить за аренду. Для этого Тахмине нужно 2000 долларов США. Эту сумму она просит в кредит и очень надеется на финансовую поддержку. Кредит поможет ей расплатиться за аренду и продолжить свою торговую деятельность.
texts.en:
Takhmina is from the town of Khujand. She is 31 years old, and married with two school-aged children. She has a higher education. In 2004 she opened her own business--for 10 years she has sold large and small towels, linens, blankets, etc. on the local market. 

Takhmina learned about business from her father. She only sells high-quality goods, and thus has regular customers. Takhmina rents her commercial space. Every year she brings the rent payment for the coming year. This year, due to financial difficulties, she can't independently pay the rent. She needs US$2,000. She is asking for a loan in this amount and very much hopes for financial support. The loan will help her pay the rent and continue her business operations.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent on her commercial space.

loans.name: Tabasum's Group

texts.en:
Tabasum is a 45-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She looks after her family, which consists of two sons and one daughter. Her husband has been working as a painter for the last few years. He provides services by painting houses and shops in a good manner. People in his society like his painting work. He is the sole earner of the family. Regarding his work, he needs paints, brushes, distemper (decorative paint) etc. to continue his work properly. Tabasum made contact with Kiva's partner for the loan. BRAC's staff visited her house in person and after complete satisfaction about her husband's painting work, BRAC issued her loan.

Tabasum is very thankful for Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy paints, brushes, etc

loans.name: Pacamache Group

texts.es:
Manuela (primera de izquierda  a derecha en la  fotografía) es una señora de 52 años de edad, casada, tiene  un hijo quien yá está casado, ella vive en Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, Sololá.
Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de banano, lo cual lo realiza en la comunidad donde vive; esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres, quienes se dedicaban a lo mismo desde muchos años atrás. Esta labor le genera a ella los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento familiar. Ella comenta que le gusta esta actividad porque es honesta y la ayuda a sentirse útil a su comunidad. Tiene más de 39 años de experiencia en esta actividad.
Ella decidió organizar un grupo con el objetivo de ayudarse mutuamente con su compañeras y asi mejorar sus niveles de vida. Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de insumos (fertilizante y pago de mano de obra) para mantenimiento de las  plantaciones de banano.
Manuela sueña con incrementar la extensión de sus plantaciones de banano y asi incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuela (shown in the photo standing in the first position, from left to right) is a 52-year-old woman who is married and has a son who is already married. She lives in Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, Sololá.

Manuela produces and sells bananas in the community where she lives. She learned this line of work from her parents who dedicated themselves to this trade for many years. Manuela’s work enables her to generate the necessary income for sustaining her family. She says that she enjoys her work because it is honest labor and it helps her feel useful in her community. Manuela has more than 39 years of experience in this trade.

She decided to organize a group so that she and her fellow group members could help one another and improve their standard of living. Manuela will use her loan to buy supplies (such as fertilizer) and to pay for labor so that can maintain her banana plants. She dreams of increasing her banana plantings so that she can improve her income.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and pay for labor.

loans.name: Dúo Creciendo Con Esfuerzo Group

texts.es: La señora Telma Ileana quien se dedica a la confección de blusas de tela desde hace nueve años, nuevamente se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de telas por rollo valorados en 1,150.00 quetzales cada uno. Tiene varios pedidos de blusas, pero la tela que le piden es floreada ya que es la que está muy vendible en estas fechas de verano y son seis colores los que utilizan. El dinero que tiene no le alcanza y por eso necesita más para poder comprar la tela y no que darles mal a las personas que le han hecho varios pedidos.
texts.en: Telma Ileana has been dedicated to making blouses from fabric  for nine years. Recently, she sees the need to request a loan to buy fabric by the roll valued at 1150 quetzales each. She has various blouse orders but the fabric they're requesting is flowered since it is what is very sellable in this summer season and there are six colors used. The money she has is not enough and thus she needs more to be able to buy the fabric and not do poorly by the people who have made orders.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make blouses to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Ms Sajida is 37 years old and married.  She has three children.  She dreams of providing them with the best possible standard of living, so she is working very hard to fulfill her dream.

She has been running a beauty parlor business for the last four years. She offers many services to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Due to her excellent service, she has good clientele in her area. 

In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the parlor.  She needs a loan of Rs 40,000 to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities. She is hoping to serve more customers in the future. She is confident that she can take this opportunity in best manner, which will help her to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more variety of cosmetic products

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 56 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Lagunas una comunidad que se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio, su hijo le apoya en esta labor quien también se dedica a las labores agrícolas, trabajando como jornalero en las fincas de sus vecinos, Hilda ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Hilda is 56 years old and lives in the District of Lagunas. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located an hour away from the city of Chiclayo, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Hilda raises and sells small animals from an area behind her house. Her son helps with the duties, but he also engages in farm work since he works as a day laborer on neighboring farms. Hilda is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN so that she can buy balanced feed for fattening her animals. This will enable her to generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for fattening her animals.

loans.name: Vasiliy

texts.ru:
Весна 2013 года Василию запомнится на долго. Он  провел в свои теплицы отопление и ожидал, что будет собирать урожай гораздо раньше, но всё получилось иначе. Оказалось, что  отопительные шланги он купил не качественные и из-за этого два раза пересаживал рассаду. Возникли дополнительные расходы: приобретал два раза рассаду, новые шланги.

 У Василия большая ферма и много теплиц, которые он построил за свои средства. Он очень трудолюбивый, серьезно относится к своему бизнесу и поэтому его бизнес быстро развивается. В этом году Василий обратился за кредитом по совету друзей. Полученные средства помогут Василию закупить семена, пленку, удобрения на новый сезон. Он надеется получить хороший урожай, так как его бизнес – единственный источник дохода в семье.
texts.en:
Vasiliy will remember spring 2013 for a long time. He installed heating in his greenhouses and expected a harvest much earlier. It all turned out differently. The heating hoses that he purchased were of low quality, and so he had to transplant the seedlings twice. He had additional expenses of new hoses and seedlings. 

He has a big farm and a lot of greenhouses, which he built. He is very hardworking, serious about his business and thus it grew quickly. This year Vasiliy applied for a loan on the advice of his friends. The funds will enable him to buy seeds, films and fertilizer for the new season. He hopes to get a good harvest as his business provides his family's only income.

loans.use: to purchase film, seeds and fertilizer for greenhouses.

loans.name: Claudia Vanessa

texts.es:
Claudia, se ha decidido por otro crédito para incorporar más mercadería a su tienda, en esta oportunidad comprara aceite, golosinas, pan, lejía, jabón, frutas y verduras. 
El efecto que ha tenido el crédito anterior en su negocio ha sido muy positivo, pues surtió de varios productos su negocio, dándole la apartidad de aumentar sus ventas y mejorar la economía familiar.
texts.en:
Claudia has decided to request another loan so that she could incorporate more merchandise into her store. She is taking this opportunity to buy oil, snack foods, bread, bleach, soap, fruits, and vegetables.

The effect of her previous loan on her business was very positive since she was able to restock her store with various products. This helped to increase her sales and improve her family’s finances.

loans.use: to buy oil, snack foods, bread, bleach, soap, fruits, and vegetables.

loans.name: Dúo Dios Esta Con Nosotros Group

texts.es:
DUO DIOS ESTA CON NOSOTROS
Este dúo está conformado por Julia es casada y madre de familia ella se dedica a la venta de comida en el mercado municipal de Sumpango, todos los días se levanta desde muy temprano para poder elaborar sus platillos que a diario vende. Es el primer crédito que solicita en kiva prometen pagar puntualmente en cada pago esperando que le puedan ayudar con el crédito ya que ellas sueñan con que sus hijos se desenvuelvan bien en sus estudios pero para eso ellas tienen que colaborar con sus esposos para poder salir adelante.
texts.en: This duo includes Julia.  She is married and a mother who sells food in the Sumpango city market and rises very early every morning to prepare her dishes.  This will be her first loan through Kiva and promises to make her payments on time and hopes that you can help her with this loan because she dreams that her children will be able to develop well.  These ladies have to work together with their husbands so that they can all get ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Juan Lorgio

texts.es:
Juan tiene 19 años de edad, estado civil soltero vive con sus padres, Vive en el  Cantón Mocache provincia de los Ríos.

Pertenece a la ventanilla LOS LUCHADORES se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto La Guayas, pertenece al cantón Mocache esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace algunos años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es tener un carro y comprarse una casa. 
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the Mocache settlement in the Rios province.

He is a member of the LOS LUCHADORES group, located in La Guayas, part of the Mocache settlement.  The people here are farmers and raise livestock.

Juan is a farmer and has been raising corn and rice for several years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them at the local market.

He is asking for this loan to buy fertilizer for his corn and rice crop.  The loan has helped hom increase his income for to feed his family and to invest.  His dream is to have a car and buy a house.

He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: María Leonor

texts.es:
María de 67 años de edad,  se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar es una persona con muy buenos principios morales y cívicos muy conocida en su comunidad, ya que también se dedica a la vender de maíz y frijoles de los cuales provienen de sus cosechas. Ella se creció con sus padres quienes también se dedicaban a la agricultura y a la venta de granos básicos y en dichas actividades también participaba. 

María carece de una formación académica,  ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos y no alcanzaban a cubrir con todas las necesidades con el paso del tiempo fue creciendo y conoció a su esposo y con el cual son padres de dos hijas una de 15 años de edad y la otra de 25 años, la menor se encuentra estudiando 9º grado.

El esposo de María, se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra de granos básicos, realizando esta actividad lleva mas de 15 años la cual la realiza con ayuda de sus hijas y su esposa.
 
por su parte María, realiza los oficios domésticos de su casa, se preocupa por mantener su casa con las mas estrictas normas de higiene, para que su familia goce de buena salud; ademas, ella vende granos básicos provenientes de las cosechas que realiza su esposo. Llevando acabo esta actividad llevan mas de 7 años, dicha actividad fue aprendida de sus padres los cuales se dedicaron toda su vida a la agricultura y esta actividad es la que les esta dando la oportunidad de superación a sus hijas.


El dinero sera utilizado, para consolidar una deuda en la comercial donde adquirieron una estufa  y una cama, los cuales mejoran su comodidad al momento de preparación de sus alimentos y un placentero descanso, ya que antes de adquirir estos dos equipos cocinaba en una hornilla de leña y su cama ya había dado la vida útil manifestó.      


La señora tiene proyectado que al terminar de pagar este préstamo, va adquirir otro para amueblar y equipar su casa de esta forma tendrán mejor comodidad y estadía en su hogar y asegura que  uniendo esfuerzos con su esposo podra sacar adelante a sus hijas hasta que se gradúen de la universidad.
texts.en:
Maria is 67 years old and works in the home.  She is a person of good moral and civil principles and is well known in the community and also sells corn and beans from her harvest.  She was raised by her parents who were also farmers and sold basic grains, which she also does.

Maria does not have a formal education because her parents were of limited resources and they were not able to cover all the expenses.  As she grew, she met her husband and they have two daughters, ages 15 and 25.  The younger one is in 9th grade. 

Maria’s husband is a farmer and raises basic grains.  He’s been doing this for more than 15 years with help from his wife and daughters.  Maria does the housework under the strictest standards of hygiene so that the family can enjoy good health.  She also sells basic grains from her husband’s harvest and has been doing this for more than seven years.  She learned from her parents who farmed all their lives.  This activity is what is providing her daughters the chance to get ahead.

The money will be used to consolidate a loan they got for a stove and a bed, which makes it more comfortable for them when preparing food and when resting.  Prior to this she cooked on a wood burning stove and the bed was past its useful life.

She plans to finish paying off this loan and then ask for another one to furnish her home and be more comfortable.  She is certain that she and her husband will be able to get their daughters ahead until they graduate from university.

loans.use: to buy a stove and a bed.

loans.name: Humaira  Kanawal

texts.en: Ms. Humaira is a 36-year-old, married woman and a mother of three. She has been running a business selling cloths for many years. She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells it to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. Humaira requested a loan of PKR 45,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy an ample variety of different cloths by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers.  This way, she would be able to earn more income through greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: To buy an ample variety of cloths in a larger quantity.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en: Tahira is a 41-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. She, along with her husband (who is also shown in the photo), have been running a tailoring business for many years. They stitch clothes for the people of their community and use the income to support their entire family. Due to the lack of availability of funds they are unable to meet the daily demands of their customers. For this reason, Tahira requested a loan of PKR 40,000 from Kashf Foundation.  She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons. It will help them to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthier source of income.  She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Pavel

texts.ru:
С детства Павел старался всё делать как можно лучше. Его мама была христианкой, поэтому привила ему любовь к Богу и к труду. Павел занимается выращиванием овощей и за  последние 10 лет он хорошо развил свой бизнес. У него есть  много теплиц, часть из них отапливаются. 

Павел очень любит свое дело, он очень аккуратный, поэтому в хозяйстве всегда идеальный порядок. Также у Павла есть покрасочная камера, к нему часто обращаются за помощью в рихтовке и покраски авто, что дает Павлу дополнительный доход.

В этом году Павел много средств вкладывал в постройку новых теплиц и на отопление, поэтому ему понадобились дополнительные средства на покупку семян и пленки.

У Павла растут двое детей, он заботится чтобы у них было все необходимое.  Пока семья живет  в стареньком домике, но Павел мечтает построить в скором будущем новый.
texts.en:
Since childhood Pavel has tried to always improve. His mother was a Christian, so instilled in him a love of God and work. Pavel farms vegetables and for the past ten years has successfully developed his business. He has many greenhouses, some of which are heated. 

Pavel loves his job. He is meticulous, so the farm is always in perfect order. He also has a painting "chamber," used frequently for fixing and painting cars to earn additional income. This year Pavel invested a lot of money to build new greenhouses and heating, so he needed additional funds to buy seeds and films. Pavel has two children--he wants to ensure that they have everything they need. The family lives in a small, old house, but Pavel hopes to build a new house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and film for greenhouses.

loans.name: José Gregorio

texts.es:
José de 59 años de edad, apenas pudo estudiar hasta segundo grado de educación básica, se dedica a la agricultura y está acompañado, tiene cinco hijos los cuales todos son mayores de edad, algunos de ellos viven en los Estados Unidos de América. 

José se dedica al cultivo de pipián, durante muchos años se ha desempeñado en otras actividades, pero veía que el trabajo era más y los ingresos que obtenía eran menos, a raíz de esta situación, decidió cultivar pipián y se siente muy satisfecho porque le va mejor.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar abono y demás insumos para el cultivo, pero no cuenta con los recursos económicos suficientes para poder hacerlo, sus hijos le apoyan para que él no trabaje, pero José se siente muy útil y ocupado trabajando y quiere hacerlo mientras pueda, por eso decidió sacar este crédito para poder trabajar en lo que más le gusta, la agricultura.

Él sueña con seguir adelante en el cultivo de pipián, y obtener ingresos que le permitan alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 59 years old.  He was only able to attend school through second grade.   He works in agriculture and, along with his life partner, has five children, all of whom are adults, and some of whom live in the U.S.

José works planting pipián (a type of squash or pumpkin raised for seeds). For many years he worked in other areas, but he saw that the work was more and the income less. For that reason he decided to grow pipián and he feels very satisfied because it has gone better for him.  

The loan that he needs is for purchasing fertilizer and other items for cultivation, but he does not have sufficient economic resources in order to make the purchase.  His children help him so that he wouldn't have to work, but José feels very useful and occupied working and he wants to do it while he still can.  For that reason he decided to take out this loan in order to be able to continue to work in the activity that he likes, which is agriculture.

He dreams of continuing to grow pipián, and of obtaining an income that will allow him to reach a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other items for his crops.

loans.name: Caleb

texts.en: Caleb is a 33-year-old man. He has two children, ages 1 year and 6 years. He describes himself to be creative. He operates a retail business where he sells jikos (stoves). He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in a densely populated area and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of jikos for resale. His business goal is to be successful within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will improve his life standards. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: buy more stock of jikos (stoves) for resale

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el caserío de Moyepampa, una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de cafeto de la variedad catimor, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 20 años, Rodolfo ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para su cultivo de café y de esta manera prevenir cualquier tipo de plaga, logrando una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is 34 years old and lives with his wife and children in the village of Moyepampa, a rural area in the District of Pucará. The residents engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This area is located in Jaén Province in the region of Cajamarca, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.

Rodolfo is a farmer who specializes in growing coffee of the catimor variety. He has been in this line of work for 20 years. Rodolfo is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,000 PEN so that he can buy compost for his coffee crop. This will prevent any type of pest. He will be able to achieve timely production so that he can offer his product to his customers.

loans.use: to buy compost for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa de 52 años de edad, lastimosamente, solo estudió hasta primer grado y decidió aprender oficios domésticos, está soltera y tiene 4 hijos.

Durante treinta años, se dedicó a la venta de comida, hasta que un día, sus compañeras murieron en un lamentable accidente, ella decidió abandonar el comercio y dedicarse a la agricultura. 

Rosa vive con dos sobrinos y son ellos quienes le ayudan a trabajar la tierra, ella no sueña con grandes cosas o llegar a tener mucho dinero, solo le pide a Dios que le de fuerzas para trabajar y cuidar de sus animales.

El crédito lo necesita para invertir en la siembra de maíz, pues sueña con seguir trabajando, como lo ha hecho hasta ahora, para lograr ingresos que le permitan seguir adelante con su vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 52 years old. Unfortunately, she only studied up to first grade and decided to learn domestic chores. She is single and has 4 children. For thirty years she worked selling food, until one day her friends died in an unfortunate accident and she decided to stop selling and begin working in agriculture. Rosa lives with two nephews, who help her to work the land. She does not dream of big things or to have a lot of money; she only asks God to give her the strength to work and take care of her animals. She needs the loan to invest in growing corn, because she dreams of continuing to work, as she has done until now, to earn an income that will allow her to keep moving forward in her life.

loans.use: To invest in growing corn.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en: Uzma has successfully built her business selling animals with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. Previously with the help of Kiva loan she purchased animals for the expansion of her business. Now she applied for a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase two more calves. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She dreams of providing better quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business. She is in her 5th loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Safarkhon

texts.ru:
Этого мужчину на фотографии зовут Сафархон. Сафархон веселый, жизнерадостный мужчина, любящий сын, ответственный отец и верный муж. Сафархону 34 года. У него маленький сын и дочь. Жена Сафархона домохозяйка она следит за маленькими детьми. Семью обеспечивает только Сафархон. 
   Сафархон работает в сфере торговли одежды. Несколько лет назад он открыл маленький магазин по продаже мужских вещей. Чтобы открыть свой магазин Сафархон много старался и трудился. Продажей одежды занимается сам Сафархон и ему помогает его мама. 
   Сафархон решил расширить свою деятельность. Сафархон планирует купить помещения и открыть еще один магазин по продаже женской и мужской одежды. Но для купли помещения у него не хватает средств. Сафархон просит кредит на сумму $5000 с надеждой на то, что ему помогут.
texts.en:
The man in the photograph is named Safarkhon. He is happy and good-natured, a loving son, responsible father and faithful husband. Safarkhon is 34 years old with a small son and daughter. His wife takes care of their young children. He is the sole breadwinner for the family. 

Safarkhon works in the clothing business. A few years ago he opened a small store to sell men's items. In order to open his store, he decided to expand his business. Safarkhon is planning to buy space and open another store to sell women's and men's clothing. He doesn't have sufficient funds to buy the space, so he is requesting a loan for USD5,000 with the hope that he will get help.

loans.use: to purchase a commercial space to open a store selling men's and women's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a television that he bought through an advertisement.

loans.name: Gulam  Fatima

texts.en: Gulam Fatima is 51 years old married woman and running a business of tailoring with her son who is also shown in the photo. She has been in this line of work for many years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. She was facing problems to educate her children in a well disciplined school. She felt it obligatory to change her family’s living standards and start working from home. Her hard work helped her establish a good clientele but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. Then she asked Kashf Foundation for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase a new stitching machine along with spools of threads in various colors. Its her 6th loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine along with spools of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Turdi

texts.ru: Турди 51 год. Он проживает в селе района Шахритус со своей семьей. Турди обеспечивает свою семью за счет земледелия. Он опытный дехканин, занимающийся выращиванием сельскохозяйственной культуры. Турди запасся 150 вязкой сена. Он планирует параллельно начать бизнес откорм-продажа скота. У Турди в хозяйстве имеются две коровы для нужд семьи. Поэтому у него уже есть опыт в выращивании скотов. Чтобы реализовать свою цель, Турди просит кредит, на сумму которого он хочет закупить двух голов крупнорогатого скота. Благодаря кредиту у него будет стабильный бизнес, с помощью которого он сможет улучшить жилищные условия.
texts.en: Turdy is 51 years old. He lives in a region called Shahrituz with his family. Turdy supports his family with his agricultural income. He is an experienced farmer who grows crops. Turdy has stocked 150 bales of hay. He plans to start a cattle-raising business. He has two cows, so he already has experience raising cattle. In order to meet his goals, Trudy is requesting a loan to buy two heads of cattle. With this loan he will have a stable business with which he will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two heads of cattle to start a new business.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself as hardworking. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be theft and break down of his motorcycle. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy motorcycle spare parts.This will enable him run his business smoothly. His business goal is to be prosperous within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will achieve his business goals. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Kulmat

texts.ru:
Кулмат женатый мужчина в возрасте 51 года. Он воспитывает двоих детей. Его старший сын учится в университете, дочь учится в средней школе. Кулмат большое внимание уделяет воспитанию и образованию детей. Кулмат старается, чтобы ее дети получали возможность учиться и быть образованными. 
   Кулмат работает грузиком на рынке и хочет дополнительно заняться животноводством. Для начала бизнеса ему не хватает денег. По этой причине он просит кредит. Помогите ему собрать не достающую сумму денег для купли скотов, чтобы начать новый бизнес и создать больше экономических возможностей.
texts.en:
Kulmat is a 51-year-old married man.  He is raising two children.  His son is a university student.  His daughter is still in high school.  Kulmat pays a lot of attention to his children's upbringing and education.  He would do anything to give his children the opportunity to study and receive an education.

While Kulmat makes a living loading merchandise at the market, he would also like to get involved in animal husbandry.  However,  he doesn't have enough money to start a new business, so he is taking a loan.  Please help him gather the necessary funds, so that he can buy some livestock and enjoy better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and start a new business in animal husbandry.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en: Safia is 31 years old, married and has earned a living by selling milk and dairy products with her husband for the last 11 years. They have two buffaloes that produce milk which they sell to their neighbors along with butter and cheese. Safia tends the buffaloes and collects their milk while her husband travels about selling their products. In order to improve her business, she has applied to the Kashf Foundation for a loan for PKR 50,000 to buy one more buffalo. Safia is taking out her fifth loan and has a good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Фируза. Ей 28 лет. Она живет с мамой на районе Шахритус. Фируза замужем, но ее муж находиться за приделами Республики на заработках. Фируза нигде не работает. Но у нее огромное желание стать самостоятельной и обеспечить себя и своих будущих детей. 
   Фируза планирует начать маленький бизнес по продаже обуви. Она ответственная и целеустремленная. Фируза планирует приобрести товар из рынка города Душанбе и перепродать на рынке родного района. Чтобы купить первый товар  у нее не хватает денег. Она верит, что мир не без добрых людей и ей помогут начать бизнес.
texts.en: This is Firuza.  She is 28 years old and lives with her mother in the Shahrituz region of Tajikistan.  She is married but her husband is currently working abroad.  Firuza is not currently working, but she has an enormous desire to become independent and to be able to provide for herself and her future children.  She is planning to launch a small business and start selling shoes.  She is responsible and focused.  She plans to buy some merchandise at a market in Dushanbe and resell her goods at a local market.  However, she doesn't have enough money to buy her first batch of merchandise.  She believes that there are many kind people in the world who will help her to start her own business.

loans.use: to launch a new business and start selling shoes.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: La señora Reyna, quien antes se dedicaba a vender tortillas ahora tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación, con su esposo luchan para sacar adelante a su hijo en los estudios, ella sueña con hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos, solicita el crédito para invertir en productos de mayor consumo por sus clientes como: granos básicos, gaseosas, golosinas, reposterías, cereales y productos enlatados.
texts.en: Reyna, who used to make a living selling tortillas, now has a small general store in her home. There she and her husband work hard to help their children move forward with their education. Reyna dreams of growing her business to increase her income. She is requesting this loan in order to invest in bulk products for her customers such as staple grains, sodas, candy, desserts, cereals, and canned products.

loans.use: to invest in staple grains, sodas, candy, desserts, cereals, and canned products.

loans.name: Fiaz

texts.en:
Ms. Fiaz is a 44-year-old married woman who has earned a living by selling milk for the last 15 years. She has two cows and one calf and sells milk in various neighborhoods. She also makes butter that she sells to her clients. 
 
Ms. Fiaz has three daughters and two sons, and her goal is to provide them with a better life as well as good food and clothing.  She is working very hard to improve her business so that she can pay day-to-day expenses. She is in her third year with the Kashf Foundation, and is happily running her business with support from our group. She is requesting a loan for Rs 40,000 to buy another cow. Her goal is to increase her milk production so that she can generate more income and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a new cow

loans.name: Jose Edenilson

texts.es:
José, se dedica a reparar vehículos, su negocio está ubicado en una zona adecuada, tiene popularidad a pesar de la competencia, su horario es de 7:00 a.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m., con este negocio obtiene los recursos económicos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Vive junto a su esposa y un hijo, los cuales dependen completamente de él.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar juego de llaves, gato de piso, empaques, aditivos. Son algunas herramientas y materiales que le ayudaran a ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, espera aumentar el número de clientes para que sus ingresos aumenten.
Su sueño es tener un taller mecánico mejor equipado que le permita trabajar por un tiempo indefinido.
texts.en:
José repairs vehicles. His business, which is located in a suitable area, is popular despite the competition. His schedule is from 7:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. This business enables him to generate the necessary financial resources to cover his household expenses. He lives with his wife and son, who are completely dependent on him.

This loan will be used to buy a set of wrenches, a floor jack, gaskets, and additives. These are some of the tools and materials that will help him offer better service to his customers. He hopes to increase his clientele so that he can generate more income. His dream is to have a repair shop that is better equipped so that he can work indefinitely.

loans.use: to buy a set of wrenches, a floor jack, gaskets, and additives.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en: Mumtaz is 51 years old, married and the mother of four children. She earns a living by buying baby goats at low prices, raising them and then selling  them for a higher price. She earns enough money from her business to contribute to her family's income, but needs to improve her business to meet the needs of her children. For this reason, she contacted the Kashf Foundation to request a loan for PKR. 45,000 to buy more goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will expand her business and raise her income. This will be her fifth loan and she has a good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy more goats.

loans.name: Teódulo

texts.es:
Teódulo de 76 años de edad, no tuvo la dicha de ir a la escuela, pero puede leer y escribir, actualmente está soltero, ya que su pareja se encuentra en otra ciudad, tiene 7 hijos pero solamente uno vive con ellos y que actualmente estudia sexto grado.

Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura toda su vida y lo aprendió gracias a su padre, pues él trabajaba en la ganadería. Actualmente, está cosechando 7 hectáreas de maicillo. Para cuidar del ganado se va en carro, ya que le queda a una distancia de 1 km.

El préstamo lo necesita, para pagar mozos, para cortar y picar el zacate. El cliente desea seguir trabajando en el campo para el sustento diario y que su hijo menor termine el año escolar.
texts.en:
Teódulo, 76 years old, didn’t have the chance to go to school but he can read and write.  At the moment he is single as his partner is in another city.  He has 7 children but only one lives with them who currently is in the sixth grade. 

He has made a living in agriculture all his life and he learned it thanks to his father who worked raising livestock.  At present, he is harvesting 7 hectares of sorghum.  In order to care for the livestock he has to go by car as he is a distance of 1 kilometer away.

He needs the loan in order to pay workers for cutting and chopping up the fodder.  He wants to continue working in the fields for his daily sustenance and he wants his youngest son to finish the school year.

loans.use: to pay workers to cut and chop up fodder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some calves and start a new business.

loans.name: Manuel Virgilio

texts.es:
Manuel de 76 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado y tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad, ellos viven en su casa pero todos trabajan. 

Él se dedica al trabajo en la agricultura y ganadería, siendo esta la actividad económica de la cual ha dependido toda su familia


Él necesita de este crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y para comprar ganado.

Manuel sueña con  poder trabajar mucho más, para dejarles a sus hijos las herramientas necesarias para que ellos puedan trabajar en lo propio, y obtengan un capital familiar.
texts.en:
Manuel is 76 years old. He has a sixth-grade education. Manuel is married and has three adult children who live with him. They are all working. 

Manuel makes a living by farming and raising livestock. His entire family depends on this activity. Manuel needs this loan in order to invest in seeds, compost, fertilizers, and livestock. 

Manuel creas of being able to work more so that he can leave his children the necessary tools to be ably to work on their own and earn money for the family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, and livestock.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 35 años de edad, estudió hasta octavo grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos y solo  dos de ellos estudian.

Él siempre se ha dedicado al trabajo de la agricultura y ganadería y su esposa le ayuda en estas actividades. 

José necesita de este crédito, para comprar cerdos pequeños, engordarlos  y luego venderlos, pues de esta manera obtiene buenos ingresos para mantener a su familia.

Él sueña con seguir trabajando muy duro y comprar más ganado para aumentar las ganancias y que sus hijos puedan estudiar y sacar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en: José, 35 years old, studied through the eighth grade. He is married and his wife is a stay-at-home mom. They have three children, but only two are in school. José has earned a living farming and raising livestock with the help of his wife. He needs this loan to but small pigs he can fatten and sell. In this way, José will obtain better profits to help him provide for his family. He dreams of continuing to work hard and buy more livestock to increase his income. He wants his children to be able to study through college.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Wanki Mairin Group

texts.es:
Silvia: Es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 53 años de edad casada, tiene 9 hijos, de los cuales tres son adolescentes que asisten al colegio; su marido no tiene trabajo formal. Desde hace 4 meses organizó el grupo solidario Wangki Mairin que en miskito significa mujeres del río, en honor al Río Coco, que se considera el río más largo de Centroamérica que cruza por Waspam y más de cien comunidades miskitas del municipio que lleva el mismo nombre.

Esta mujer sonriente, desde hace 5 años vende bastimentos (Yuca, quequisque, plátano, banano, filipita) y frutas (coco, naranja, limones) en el mercado de Waspam. Solicita financiamiento para incrementar la cantidad de los productos que vende. Su sueño es tener su propio tramo y diversificar sus actividades para generar más ingresos.

Celovia: Tiene 56 años de edad, desde hace 7 años, vende bastimento en el mercado municipal de Waspam, solicita financiamiento para incrementar su inventario y tener mayor oferta de productos. Su sueño es instalar en su vivienda una pulpería donde pueda vender otros tipos de productos que demanda la población. 

Claricia: También es integrante del grupo Wangki Mairin,  tiene 59 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres menores de edad. Desde hace 3 años inició con capital propio la venta de bastimentos en el mercado municipal de Waspam, instalándose a la orilla de la calle, ofertando sus productos ocupando como mantel bolsas grandes de poliuretano; no posee tramo o mesa donde exponer su mercadería. Solicita financiamiento para incrementar su inventario de productos para poder vender más y mejorar sus ingresos. Su sueño es construir su vivienda de concreto y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Silvia:  She is an enterprising woman.  She is 53 years old, married and she has 9 children.  Three of them are adolescents who attend school.  Her husband doesn’t have a formal job.  Four months ago she organized the solidarity group Wangki Mairin that in Miskito means “women of the river,” in honor of Río Coco, which is considered the longest river in Central America that goes through Waspam.  More than one hundred Miskita communities in the municipality bear the same name. 

For five years this smiling woman has sold provisions (yucca, taro, plantains, bananas, “filipitas”—a variety of banana) and fruits (coconuts, oranges, lemons) in the Waspam market.  She is requesting financing to increase the quantity of the products that she sells.  Her dream is to have her own space and diversify her activities in order to generate more income.

Celovia: She is 56 years old.  For seven years she has sold provisions in the municipal market of Waspam.  She is requesting financing in order to increase her inventory and to have a greater offering of products.  Her dream is to install a small store in her house where she can sell other types of products that are in demand among the people.
  
Claricia:  She is also a member of the Wangki Mairin group.  She is 59 years old and she is a single mother with three children who are minors.  Three years ago she started with her own capital selling provisions in the municipal market of Waspam, setting up on the edge of the street, offering her products using large bags of polyurethane as a tablecloth.  She doesn’t have a spot or table where she can set up her merchandise.  She is requesting financing in order to increase her inventory of products to be able to sell more and to improve her income.  Her dream is to build her house out of concrete and grow her business.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of products to be able to sell more and improve her income.

loans.name: María Esterlina

texts.es:
María es una joven de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, tiene un hijo y es madre soltera, ella y su hijo viven en casa de su madre.

Ella tiene en su casa un negocio de venta de tortillas, pues siente que le genera buenos ingresos. La necesidad de salir adelante, la llevó a emprender este negocio, y lucha cada día por trabajar y que no le falte nada a su pequeño hijo.

María necesita este crédito, para comprar una cocina nueva, pues la que tiene esta muy deteriorada. El crédito le ayudará a continuar con el negocio, y a no detener sus actividades diarias, de esta forma siempre tendrá el recurso necesario para trabajar y que no le falten los ingresos económicos para sostenerse.

Ella sueña con trabajar duro para poder brindar la oportunidad de estudiar a sus hijos y apoyarlo en lo que sea necesario, además desea comprar una hectárea para dejarle  herencia a su hijo y que él viva  en una casa propia.
texts.en:
María is a 20-year-old woman who left school in third grade, has a son, and is a single mother.  She and her son live in her mother's house.  

María has a business selling tortillas from her home, which she feels generates a good income.  The need to get ahead in life led her to start this business, and she strives every day to work so that her little son won't want for anything.  

María needs this loan to buy a new stove since the one she has is not in good shape.  The loan will help her to continue her business and not stop her daily activities.  This way she will always have the resources necessary to work and not be without the economic means to sustain herself.  

She dreams of working hard to be able to provide her children with the opportunity to go to school and all the necessary support.  She also wants to buy a hectare of land to be her son's inheritance so he can live in his own house.

loans.use: to buy a new stove

loans.name: María Elba

texts.es:
María de 63 años de edad, estudió solamente primer grado en el programa de alfabetización, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tiene tres hijos que están en Estados Unidos, y tiene uno que ella ha criado como su hijo.

Ella trabaja arduamente en la venta de tamales de elote en la comunidad donde ella vive, realiza esta actividad desde los 14 años, pues su familia era muy pobre y era necesario trabajar para tener el sustento de cada día.

María necesita de este para invertir en su negocio, comprar elote y yuca, de esta manera podrá vender más y obtener mayores ganancias.

Ella sueña con poder trabajar más y ahorrar, para dejarles un capital o herencia  a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María  is 63 years old. She only studied to a first grade reading level. Her husband works in agriculture. She has three children that are in the United States and she has one that she has raised as a son.

She works hard selling corn tamales in the community where she lives. She has been doing this work for 14 years, as her family was very poor and it was necessary to work to have sustenance every day.

María needs this to invest in her business, purchasing corn and yucca. In this way, she will be able to sell more and obtain better income.

She dreams of being able to work more and save in order to leave leave an inheritance to her children.

loans.use: to buy corncob and yucca.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is a married man. He has five children. He describes himself to be innovative. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. His business is located in a good area, and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. 

He will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings loan to buy motorcycle spare parts. His business goal is to be successful within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have an improved life. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Vilma Dinora

texts.es:
Vilma, se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar telas, broches, hilos, botones, etc., para cumplir con sus clientes y entregar a tiempo sus encargos.
El crédito anterior le sirvió a Vilma para tener los recursos que le permitieron tener  a su disposición los materiales de costuras para trabajar, sus ingresos son mejores, ha cancelado sus cuotas, en su familia su estilo de vida ha mejorado.
texts.en:
Vilma has decided to ask for a new loan to buy fabrics, snaps, threads, buttons, etc. so she can fill her orders.

The previous loan helped Vilma have the resources she needed to have sewing supplies available so she could work.  Her income is better, she has paid her debts, and her quality of life has improved.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Dúo Irma De San Pedro Group

texts.es: Dúo Irma de San Pedro La señora Irma Consuelo quien tiene una estética desde hace 9 años en la calle principal del pueblo, se ve en la necesidad de comprar dos paquetes de tintes valorados en 1000 quetzales cada uno, para tener variedad de colores de tintes y no perder ninguna visita de personas que llegan a su estética, también hace cortes de pelo, realiza peinados y varios tratamientos de belleza.  El dinero que tiene no le alcanza por eso necesita un préstamo para comprar lo que le hace falta que son los tintes.  Su sueño es un día no alquilar y tener su local propio y le pide día con día a Dios alcanzarlo.
texts.en: Irma Consuelo has had a beauty shop on a main street in town for the past nine years.  Now she needs two packs of tints valued at 1,000 Quetzales each, so that she can have a variety of tint colors and not lose any customers.  She also does haircuts, styles, and various beauty treatments.  She doesn’t have enough money and needs a loan to buy what she needs; tints.  Her dream is to be able to have her own shop and not have to rent and she asks God every day to be able to achieve it.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Maria Reynalda

texts.es:
Reynalda, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, cerdos y aves de corral, son conocimientos que heredo de sus padres, hace 10 años ella puso en práctica sus conocimientos y es apoyada por su esposo, su ventaja es que lo realiza en sus propias tierras. Reynalda es casada, vive junto  a su esposo y un hijo.
Se ha decidido por un crédito para comprar cerdos y alimento para ganado, le servirá para fortalecer su negocio y tener mejores ganancias, espera aumentar su número de clientes satisfechos.
Su sueño es continuar trabajando para mantener activo su negocio, mejorar el estilo de vida familiar y asegurarse un futuro más confortable.
texts.en:
Reynalda raises livestock, pigs and poultry.  She learned this from her parents 10 years ago and she put her knowledge to work.  Her husband helps her.  Reynalda is married and lives with her husband and son.

She is asking for a loan to buy pigs and feed.  This will help her strengthen her business and have better income.  She expects to increase her number of satisfied customers.

Her dream is to continue working to have an active business, improve her quality of life for her family and ensure a comfortable future.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Iyad

texts.en:
Iyad is 23 years old and lives in Gaza. In 2009, he thought to do something to contribute to the family income, as his parents' income alone is not sufficient to fulfill the demands of all the family members.

He started selling gifts and accessories at a stall on a street. He worked hard to improve his business. He is dreaming to provide good living conditions for his children’s future; he wants them to have a better life than his life.

Iyad is asking Ryada for this youth loan to expand his stall and pay the government to get permission for that, which will allow him to sell more goods and increase his income.

Iyad is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in this business with this youth loan.

loans.use: to expand his stall and pay the government to get permission to do so

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sheep.

loans.name: Rameh

texts.en:
Rameh is a 24-year-old single man responsible for providing for six members of his beloved family. Being the sole breadwinner is a big responsibility; that's why he has to work hard to stay capable of developing himself to be capable of starting his own business.

Rameh has been employed in a car maintenance garage since 2005, and he is getting a wide experience in his domain; that's why he is acquiring a youth loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a car, which will help him do mobile mechanical services on his own that will increase his income and develop his living.

Rameh is very anxious about this loan. He is working hard to start his own business, and this is his first step forward.

loans.use: To buy a car, which will help him do mobile mechanical services

loans.name: Bashiran

texts.en:
Bashiran is a 46-year-old married woman who has been selling milk for the past few years. She has two cows in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life. Bashiran is the mother of three children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life, with good education, food and clothing. She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of her life. 

This is Bashiran's fourth year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through its support. Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to increase her production capacity, which will ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow

loans.name: Suraya  Bibi

texts.en:
Suraya is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a general store at the corner of her house. She has 10 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. 

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 rupees to buy packs of salts, biscuits, eggs, sugar, oil, cold drinks and fruit to meet with the increasing demand in her shop. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. She is in her sixth loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits, eggs, sugar, oil, cold drinks and fruit.

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert is a 29-year-old married man. He has three children with ages ranging from 3 years to 7 years. He describes himself to be focused and ambitious. He operates a masonry business where he builds houses. He has been involved in this business for nine years. His business is located in a conducive and business friendly area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. 

He will use the 50,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy masonry tools to help him improve the services he offers. His business goal is to offer quality service, thus expanding the business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his business. 

This is his second loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy masonry tools

loans.name: Rasoolan

texts.en: Rasoolan  is a 52-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. She has been running an animal sales business for the past eight years. She buys animals (baby cows) at low prices and raises them, and then her husband sells them in the market at higher prices. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. She is currently requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase two more cows. She is in her third loan cycle, with a good repayment history. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good-quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase two more cows

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.
Me llamo José Luis, tengo 56 años y tengo un restaurante de tacos desde hace más de 30 años.  Estoy casado y tengo 3 hijos, aunque ellos ya no dependen de mi. empece vendiendo comida en eventos, bailes y ferias; después decidí poner un restaurante fijo, afortunadamente he logrado crecer porqué ofrezco buena calidad y buenos precios. Estoy pidiendo el crédito para mejorar mi negocio y me considero una persona responsable y soy puntual en mis pagos. Mis principales logros es haber sacado adelante a mis hijos y pagarles una carrera en la universidad. También he podido ahorrar y comprar un coche.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is his story:

My name is José Luis, I'm 56 years old and have had a taco restaurant for more than 30 years. I am married and have 3 children who are grown and independent. I began selling food at events, dances and fairs; later I decided to set up a fixed restaurant. Luckily, I have been able to grow because I offer good quality and good prices.

I am asking for a loan to make improvements to my business. I consider myself responsible and I am punctual in my payments. My main achievements are to have helped my children to get ahead and to have put them through university. I have also been able to save and to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and air-condition his restaurant.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Ella es Lina Marcela, es estudiante de Cosmetología y Estética Corporal 2 semestre, tiene 22 años, en este momento esta sin empleo y en búsqueda, la idea es encontrar pronto ya que necesita un ingreso para poder costear el estudio.  Vive en unión libre con muchos sueños por alcanzar junto con el esposo, no tiene hijos por el momento ya que la idea es profesionalizar y tener lo necesario para pensar en formar una familia. 

El núcleo familiar se compone por la madre María Claudia, se dedica al hogar, el  padre Victor Ricardo, vive en Bogotá y es comerciante, ellos son separados hace aproximadamente 7 años, tiene un hermano menor de 11 años, vive con la mamá y un hermano mayor que vive en Bogotá y ya es casado.   

Tiene muchos sueños y aspiraciones a nivel profesional y personal, como lo es culminar el estudio que esta haciendo actualmente y profesionalizare con ayuda de diplomados y así ser una gran esteticista y llenarse de conocimientos para poder tener el propio Spa, la idea no es solo tener uno si no muchos puntos a nivel nacional, Para este año esta proyectando el ahorro para tener una casa propia.

Desea tener el convenio para poder realizar el sueño de tener varios locales a nivel nacional, ya que los gastos que se ahorraría en el pago de la cuota mensual lo podría ahorrar para poder tener la casa propia que tanto desea, con la ayuda de kiva y campo alto les agradecería enormemente.
texts.en:
This is Lina Marcela.  She is a second semester cosmetology and beauty student.  She is 22, and at the moment is unemployed and looking for work.  She hopes to find a job soon since she needs an income to be able to pay for school.  She lives with her common law husband and they have a lot of dreams they want to pursue together.  She doesn't have children yet since she wants to become a professional and have what she needs to think about starting a family.

In her immediate family are her mother María Claudia, who is a homemaker, and her father Victor Ricardo, who lives in Bogotá and works in commerce.  They have been separated for approximately seven years.  She has a younger brother who is 11 and lives with their mother, and an older brother who lives in Bogotá and is married.  

She has a lot of dreams and aspirations, both professional and personal, such as finishing the program where she is currently studying and becoming a professional with the help of alumni.  This would allow her to be a great beautician and learn a lot so she can have her own spa.  She hopes to have not just one but lots of locations around the country.  This year she is planning to save to buy a house.  

She wants the loan so she can realize her dream of having various locations around the country, since what she saves on the monthly payments she could save to put towards having her own house, which she wants so much.  She would be enormously grateful for the help of Kiva and CampoAlto.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Parveen is 38 years old, married and the mother of three children. She has been running a business of animal sales for the past 10 years. She buys animals (baby cows) at low prices and raises them. Then her husband sells them out in the market at a higher price. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation. Recently, she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more cows. She is in her fifth loan cycle with a good repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cows

loans.name: Ester

texts.en: Esther is a hard working mother of four children who are all in school. Her major challenge has been finding tuition for her children who are in secondary school, since she is an agriculturalist who mostly depends on selling milk to earn an income. She is mainly challenged during the dry season when the milk production is low due to the drought. She wants the loan to buy cows during this season when they are cheap because parents are looking for tuition. She is a hard working and innovative woman.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is a married woman with three children. She describes herself to be ambitious and opportunistic. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in an urban area and her primary customers are regular customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be theft. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to prosper within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will achieve her business goals. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to set up another shop.

loans.use: buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en: Balqees is a 50-year-old married woman. She is successfully running an animal-selling business. She has 10 years of experience in this field. She is a mother of seven children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation. Recently, she requested a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase another cow. She is in her seventh loan cycle and she is expecting a boost in her earnings. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Marwan

texts.en:
Marwan is a 41-year-old married father of two children. He established his bakery in 2003 and has 23 years of experience in his domain.
His business is going on just fine, but he needs an additional external support in order to keep it developing properly.

Marwan is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to make necessary repairs on his house to keep it a healthy living medium for his beloved family, and he will invest part of the loan in his business to increase its capital and develop it properly.

He hopes to continue to meet his family's needs.

loans.use: to make necessary repairs on his house to keep it a healthy living medium for his beloved family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for medical treatment.

loans.name: Morris

texts.en: Morris is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be hardworking and opportunistic. He operates a restaurant where he cooks food for sale. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are regular customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be theft. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy drinks and ingredients for preparing food to sell in the restaurant. His business goal is to prosper within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will achieve his business goals. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy drinks and ingredients for preparing food

loans.name: Oday

texts.en:
Oday is 22 years old and lives with his parents in Jinen at Ya’bad village. Ya'bad is a Palestinian town in the northern West Bank, 20 kilometers west of Jenin in the Jenin Governorate. It is a major agricultural town with most of the land covered with olive groves and grain fields.

Oday's family has a shortage of money to do some work on their house so he applied to Ryada for a loan to help his family improve the house and make it better. He will use the loan to repair the windows and the doors, which will result in better living conditions, and be more psychologically comfortable for his parents.

Oday said that this loan will help him a lot and he is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to repair windows and doors

loans.name: Edwin Antonio

texts.es:
Edwin de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está felizmente casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene 2 hijos y son los únicos que dependen de ellos. La casa se encuentra en promesa de venta, la cual están pagando por cuotas.

Él actualmente se dedica al comercio de huevos, hace los pedidos en una granja avícola y se los van a dejar a la puerta de su casa, desde ahí, sale con su motocicleta a venderlos a los diferentes clientes del lugar. Edwin ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a este negocio. 

Cuando estaba más joven se dedicaba a trabajos informales como albañilería y construcción, hasta que  en el 2004 consiguió empleo en la avícola, esto le permitió adquirir experiencia y el conocimiento necesario para emprender su propio negocio, y fue en el 2009 cuando decidió ya no ser empleado y dedicarse al comercio de huevos de forma independiente.


El préstamo que él está solicitando, lo necesita para para comprar más productos en este momento que los huevos se encuentran a precio cómodo, de esta manera tendría bastante producto disponible en bodega para satisfacer la demanda de clientes. Ademas necesita pagar la instalación del contador de la casa que recientemente han contratado como promesa de venta.  

Edwin sueña con crecer en el negocio, para así estabilizarse económicamente y de esta manera, obtener mejor calidad de vida, y sueña con su esposa tener otro hijo en un futuro y hacer más grande su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin, 28, who studied until the end of high school, is happily married to his wife, who dedicates her time to daily household chores.  They have two children who are the only people who depend on them.  They have their house on a purchase agreement, on which they are paying installments.

Currently, Edwin sells eggs.  He orders them from a poultry farm which delivers to his door.  From there he takes them on his motorcycle and sells them to customers in the area.  He has been doing this for four years.
