Ella es Tatiana tiene  20  años, quiere seguir con los estudios de auxiliar de enfermería, porque le gusta esta carrera, le gusta ayudar a los demás y que mejor forma que con esta profesión tan bonita, además a afrontado varias situaciones en donde se ven   en riesgo la vida de las personas que más ama y esto también la impulso a estudiar enfermería.
Tiene un hermoso hijo de 2 años y 6 meses  con el cual vive junto a los padres y hermanos, la mama se llama amparo  y el papa se llama  Henry, los hermanos se llaman james y Julián, una de las razones por las cuales quiere seguir estudiando son los padres y el hijo, ya que quiere comprar una casa para vivir con ellos y poder ofrecerle un mejor futuro al hijo y los padres.
Con la familia han afrontado barias situaciones muy duras, la primera cuando el papa se enfermo en el 2005 y debido a esto tuvieron que realizar un procedimiento, este proceso llevo bastante tiempo y el papa aun tiene recaídas graves, la situación de salud no es la mejor a si que el no ha podido laborar por mas de 6 meses.
El otro suceso que marco a la familia sucedió en el año 2011 cuando a la mama le detectaron una enfermedad muy grave,  la cual a medida del tratamiento de ha podido mejorar aunque todavía sigue con el tratamiento para que  tenga una mejoría del 100%, Por ellos y por el hijo quiere graduarse de auxiliar de enfermería  para poderles ayudar  un poco más, comprar una casa propia, ya que viven  en arriendo, ofrecerle un futuro mucho mejor al  hijo y crecer personalmente y profesional mente.
texts.en:
This is Tatiana, age 20.  She wants to continue with her assistant nursing studies because she likes this career.  She likes helping others, and what better way than with this lovely profession?  Also, she has faced various situations where there was a risk of loss of life to the people she loves the most.  This also helped drive her to study nursing.

She has a beautiful son who is two years and six months old.  She lives with him with her parents and siblings.  Her mother’s name is Amparo, and her father’s name is Henry.  Her brothers’ names are James and Julián.  

One of the reasons that she wants to continue studying is her family, her parents and her son.  She wants to buy a house to live in with them.  And she wants to be able to provide her son and her parents with a better future.

She and her family have faced various very difficult situations.  The first was when her father got sick in 2005.  Because of this, a procedure had to be performed.  This process took a lot of time.  Her father still has serious relapses.  The health situation is not the best.  Therefore, he has not been able to work for over six months.

Another event that affected her family happened in 2011 when they diagnosed her mother with a very serious illness.  With treatment, she has been able to improve, even though she still continues with the treatment in order to improve 100%.

For her parents and for her son, she wants to graduate as an assistant nurse.  She wants to be able to help them a little more and to buy her own house.  They rent where they now live.  She wants to offer her son a much better future and to grow personally and professionally.

loans.use: to pay registration fees for a semester.

loans.name: Sarem

texts.en:
Sarem is 35 years old, and lives in a village approximately seventeen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2002 and has two children; one attends school and the other is still young. She also has her elderly parents living with her.

Sarem and her husband are farmers; they grow vegetables on their farmland in the village where they live. Sarem wants to buy seed and fertilizer to maintain her vegetable farm. Hence she applied for a loan!

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer to maintain her vegetable farm.

loans.name: Yeimy Solangie

texts.es:
Yeimy solangie es una joven emprendedora, con grandes expectativas en la vida profesional y laboral.
La visión es ser licenciada en psicología y pedagogía infantil, aunque  no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacerlo; pero se le dio la oportunidad de iniciar los estudios en el instituto “Campo alto” en el programa “Atención a la primera infancia” el cual le ha aportado gran conocimiento e información para la carrera, enriqueciéndola como persona y como profesional.
Ella sabe que la formación ha sido valiosa puesto que en el campo laboral va a relacionarse con los niños, las niñas y la comunidad educativa.
Por estas razones desea continuar en el instituto, pero los gastos que en este momento ella tiene la hacen  recurrir al convenio que en este momento campo alto tiene mediante el apoyo que brinda a los estudiantes para que puedan continuar con los estudios.
texts.en:
Yeimy Solangie is an enterprising young woman with great expectations for her professional life.  Her goal is to be licensed in psychology and childhood education, although she does not have the financial resources to do so.  However, she was given the opportunity to study in the Campo Alto institute in their Early Childhood Care program, which has given her a lot of knowledge and information for her career, enriching her personally and professionally.  

She knows that the training has been very valuable because in the work field, she will be able to relate to the children and the education community.  For these reasons, she wishes to continue at the institution, but the costs have led her to resort to the agreement that Campo Alto has that provides help to students to continue their educations.

loans.use: pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Tunjung Wiguna Group

texts.en:
The Tunjung Wiguna group from Melaya, West Bali would like to thank lenders for their support. Ni Ketut, the group head, is a housewife, and has 2 adult children and 1 child still in school. Ni Ketut been running the pigs business since she was married. She purchased local piglets with her loan and raised them over several months, during which they became large and healthy. At the end of the loan period, Ni Ketut sold her pigs for 1.100.000 IDR each, yielding a respectable profit. With her profits, and with the help of a new loan from MUK, she plans to purchase additional pigs. With the overall increase in household income, she has supported the daily needs of her family, saving for sudden needs and renovations to the home.

Ni Ketut and all members of Tunjung Wiguna group are very grateful to MUK for the new loan. Ni Ketut and each member of the group received 1.500.000 IDR to develop pig farming. With funds provided in, Ni Ketut will purchase 2 superior piglets and the rest of the money will be used for feed. Ni Ketut hopes cooperation between the group and MUK will run continuously until they have their own capital for breeding pigs.

loans.use: to purchase 2 superior piglets and feed

loans.name: 03-06-09-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Ms. Vân has a retail business selling general items and food. She is requesting a loan to purchase biscuits, candy, sugar,  and milk, etc. for resale.

Vân is 55 years old and she is single with two children. Vân is the group leader of the 03-06-09-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents, since her children are grown up.

This is Vân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Vân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Vân faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In future, Vân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase biscuits, candy, sugar, and milk for resale

loans.name: Saima Asif

texts.en: Saima, age 34, is a mother of two sons and one daughter. Her husband owns a tailoring shop in a local market which is the only source of income for her family. He wants to expand his business by buying various items such as a sewing machine and supplies, including threads, needles and cloth. This is very important for him to continue his work efficiently and professionally. However, due to a lack of money he finds it difficult. Therefore his wife, Saima is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to buy the items he needs. Saima is happy to help her husband with this loan amount, and is grateful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan for their support.

loans.use: to buy tailoring supplies such as cloth, thread, cotton, a sewing machine etc.

loans.name: Daine Vanessa

texts.es:
Ella se llama Vanessa nació el 30 de junio en Bogotá, ella tiene 19 años, vive con los padres, la abuela y la hermana, toda la época y  el transcurso del estudio  lo realizo en el colegio técnico y académico celestin freinet, allí curso lo que fue preescolar, transición, toda la primaria y el bachillerato.
Mientras que adelantaba el bachillerato realizo un estudio adicional en el Sena como técnico en hotelería y turismo el cual duro 4 años, se graduó en el año 2011, obtuvo el diploma de grado y a la vez la certificación de que curso en el Sena. 
Al culminar los estudios ella comenzó  a interesarse en la parte de la medicina o en la parte de la contabilidad, se iba a presentar a la universidad  pero no habían cupos para la rama de la medicina, entonces busco otras universidades, tuvo presente varias pero eran muy costosas, se presento en campo alto allí le dieron a conocer las carreras que ofrecía la corporación las mercedes e inicio la carrera de contabilidad financiera a principios del año 2012.
Actualmente realiza  el último semestre en la corporación las mercedes, es una persona con varios principios y valores como lo son el respeto, honestidad, alegre, divertida le gusta compartir con las personas que la rodean y quiere lo mejor de ella.
Ella es un poco intolerante con las personas envidiosas e inmaduras, en el tiempo libre escucha música de los 70 y 80 o en ocasiones variada, práctica el deporte del baloncesto y el ciclismo, a veces ve películas de interés.
Ya que este es el último semestre que realiza, ella quiere poder economizar algunos gastos ya que el valor de la mensualidad es más cara, a si que ella prefiere economizar ese dinero y tener le convenio con kiva que le ofrece la corporación las mercedes, le quedan unos valores apagar mas económicos y la plata que se economiza la puede invertir en gasto extra que tenga de la carrera.
texts.en:
Vanessa was born on June 30 in Bogotá. She is 19 years old and lives with her parents, grandmother and sister. She studied at the Celestin Freinet Academic and Technical Academy from preschool, through Primary and Secondary school. When she graduated from secondary school she took additional studies at Sena (The National Service of Learning) as a technician in Hotel Management and Tourism for 4 years. She graduated in 2011 getting her degree and certification from Sena. 

Having completed those studies she became interested in Medicine and Accounting.  She wanted to enter university but there was no vacancies in the field of Medicine. So she looked for other universities saw some possibilities but they were very expensive. She came to Campo Alto and learned about the courses offered at Las Mercedes and entered the Accounting program at the beginning of 2012.

Now she is entering her last semester at Las Mercedes. She is a person with principles and values like respect, honesty, cheerful and happy to share with the people around her who wish the best for her. She is somewhat intolerant of people who are jealous or immature. In her spare time she listens to music from the 70's and 80's and sometimes plays basketball or rides a bike. She watches movies that interest her.

In this final semester she would like to economize on some expenses as the cost of tuition is expensive. So she would like to save some money having a loan from Kiva which Las Mercedes offers. She can pay less money and with that money that she saves she can invest in the extra costs that her studies require.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Oscar Jose

texts.es:
Oscar José tiene 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se caracteriza por tener grandes depósitos de arena y ripio que su población se utiliza para la construcción de viviendas, también se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, carneros y chivos en la parte posterior a su domicilio, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, son una familia unida que se esfuerza, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Oscar José is 46 years old and lives with his wife and children in the District of Cayalti. This community is known for having large deposits of sand and gravel, which the people use for building their homes. They also engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This area is located an hour away from the city of Chiclayo, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Oscar raises and sells pigs, sheep, and goats in an area behind his house. His wife helps with the work. They are a unified family that strives to get ahead. Oscar is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,000 PEN so that he can buy balanced feed for fattening his animals. This will allow him to offer the animals to his customers at a good price.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for fattening his animals.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 35 years old and comes from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with four children. Her eldest is nine and the youngest is two. Rosalina's husband is a fisherman. She helps by preparing what her husband needs. She is asking for a loan to buy nylon, pay for boat repair, and pay for the labor in making a fish net. Rosalina knows the importance of keeping her business that earns her 4000 PHP every month. The profit from fishing provides food and payment for her children's school fees. 

In the future, she hopes to continue expanding her business for the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy nylon, pay for boat repair, and labor for fish net making

loans.name: Gisele

texts.en:
Gisele, 31, has a 13-year-old child and lives in the interior of São Paulo. She has a newsstand in the downtown where she lives and works and in her spare time putting piercing. Gisele recently separated, and so is taking care of her household bills alone. 

She worked for many years at a newsstand, but a year and a half ago the owner of the newsstand died and the family decided to close the newsstand. Since Gisele had been working there for a long time and knew how to manage the business, she decided to propose to purchase the newsstand from the family of the deceased owner. They easily decided to sell it to Gisele because she was always very committed and dedicated to her work. 

Today Gisele needs money to buy well-known brands of magazines and more books and newspapers to sell.

loans.use: To buy books, magazines, and newspapers

loans.name: Diego

texts.en:
Diego, 27, has a 2-year-old daughter, is married and lives in interior of São Paulo. He works as a "motoboy" (Brazilian term for a motorcycle deliveryman) as well as in graphic design. He got a free room to work, which was provided by the city hall. He needs the money to buy material for banner printing, wooden structures, cut materials and a computer, to make his artwork. 

Diego is very keen worker and, when he has time, helps his wife take care of their daughter. He wants to devote himself entirely to design, to have more financial stability and time to see his daughter grow up.

loans.use: To buy material for banner printing, wooden structures, cut materials and a computer

loans.name: Melchora

texts.en:
Melchora is from the community of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with seven grown children. For many years now, she has been farming rice for a living. 

Melchora needs help in order to buy farm inputs like fertilizer, pesticides and seedlings. She knows how all these play an important role for a good harvest. The income from farming assures her of enough supply of food and payment for household bills like electricity and water.

In the future, she hopes to have a bigger farm, a better income and an abundant life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and seedlings

loans.name: Ma. Jonep

texts.en:
Ma. Jonep is a 38-year-old married woman with two children, ages 10 and 15. She is a rice farmer and works in Talibon, Bohol. Her husband is a carpenter. She would like to be successful in her farming so that she can help her husband with the family's expenses. Ma. Jonep is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides, and seedlings. 

She hopes that with these items, she can have a good yield during the harvest season. Her income provides food and pays for school fees of her child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and seedlings

loans.name: Luz Eneida

texts.es:
Ella es luz Eneida, es una mujer de 29 años de edad, tiene una familia conformada por (2) lindas niñas de 3 y 9 años y el esposo.
Ella quiso estudiar salud oral por qué le llama mucho la atención, le apasiona poder ayudar a los demás, ella piensa que una de las maneras que puede brindarle ayuda a la gente es anudándole a mejorar la salud oral, a ella le encanta arreglar dientes, revisar bocas y piensa que si una persona con una boca sana y una linda sonrisa se va a ver y sentir bien, va a ser una persona feliz.  
El motivo por el cual ella decidió estudiar salud oral es porque quiere en un futuro no muy lejano con ayuda de Dios y de la familia poder especializarse y ser una de las mejores odontólogas en el país y claro poder viajar a otros países y antes poder tener el propio consultorio, tener gente que le ayude y que ella pueda ayudar, la razón por la cual ella quiere la ayuda que le brinda KIVA es porque a ella le toca trabajar y estudiar al mismo tiempo y ahora que está haciendo las practicas solo puede trabajar medio tiempo y lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir los gastos de la casa  y para pagar el estudio, ella obtuvo la colaboración de kiva el primer semestre y añora que en este segundo semestre le puedan seguir brindado esa ayuda tan grande. 
Ella no quiere que los sueños sea frustrados al tener que dejar los estudios, siempre toda la viva soñó con ser independiente y tener el propio consultorio, ella está segura que con la ayuda de Dios lo va a lograr más las ganas que ella le ponga, porque todo en la vida se puede lograr cuando uno se lo propone y cuando quiere salir adelante, ella piensa poner todas las ganas por que por que ella no va a dejar que nada le interrumpa el sueño que ella quiere cumplir, este esfuerzo ella también lo hace  por las hijas, porque quiere darle un buen futuro y bienestar y que puedan ser también profesionales que estudien y que también más adelante puedan ayudar a las demás personas en cualquier cosa que lo necesiten.
texts.en:
Luz Eneida is 29 years old, and her family is made up of two beautiful girls who are 3 and 9 years old, and her husband. She decided to study oral health because she has always been interested in it.  She is passionate about being able to help others and thinks that one way she can help people is by helping them improve their oral health. She loves to fix teeth and examine mouths and thinks that if a person has a healthy mouth and a nice smile, they will look and feel good and be a happy person. 

The reason why she decided to study oral health is that she hopes that in the near future, with God's and her family's help, she will be able to specialize and be one of the best dentists in the country, travel to other countries, have her own office, have people who help her and people who she can help. This is why she wants the help that KIVA provides. She needs to work and study at the same time, and now while she is doing her internship she can only work part-time.  What she is earning is not enough to cover the household expenses and her studies. She had help from KIVA her first semester and she hopes that in the second semester they will continue to provide this great help. She hopes that her dreams will not be frustrated by having to leave school. 

All her life she has dreamed of being independent and having her own office. She is sure that with God's help and her strong desire, she will achieve her goal - everything in life is achievable if you set your mind to it and if you want to get ahead. She is putting all her effort into this and will not let anything get in the way of achieving her goal. She is doing this for her daughters, too, because she wants to give them a good future and a sense of well being. She wants them to study and become professionals so that in the future they can help people in whatever way is needed.

loans.use: to pay one semester's tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, snack foods, beverages, salt, basic grains, bread, eggs, and oil.

loans.name: Talia Coraima

texts.es:
Ella es talia coraima estudiante de salud oral 1 semestre, ella escogió esta carrera porque se siente identificada con todo lo relacionado con la salud, al terminar el bachillerato sin conocer el camino que va a empezar decide estudiar un titulado que se enfoca en la salud oral, para poder obtener un trabajo en el cual pueda  llegar a ejercer la profesión.    
Empezó a buscar institutos queriendo encontrar uno que le llenara las expectativas  de aprendizaje, comedida de pago y desempeño laboral y practico. 
Al terminar el técnico laboral quiere comenzar a trabajar en una cede como “salud coop” con familiares de él y llegar a ser la mejor de la profesión y tener el propio consultorio y ser todo una profesional. 
  
Necesita el convenio por comodidad de pago para poder colaborar a la madre ya que es muy difícil conseguir el dinero para pagar las mensualidades,  pasaje etc., ya que es la persona que le está ayudando a cumplir las metas.
texts.en:
This is Talia Coraima.  She is a first semester student studying oral health.  She chose this career because she identifies with everything having to do with health.  Upon completing high school, and without knowing the path she would start down, she decided to study for a degree that focuses on oral health.  She did this in order to be able to get a job in which she would be able to practice the profession.

She started to look for institutions.  She wanted to find one that would meet her expectations for learning, pay, and work and practice performance.

Upon finishing her technician work, she wants to start working at an entity like “salud coop” [health coop] with their families.  She wants to become the best in the profession.  She wants to have her own office and to be a complete professional.

She needs the loan to be able to help her mother make the payments.  It is very hard to get the money to pay for the monthly installments and transportation costs, etc.  Her mother is the person who is helping her meet her goals.

loans.use: to pay registration fees for a semester.

loans.name: Lise

texts.en: Lise has worked with another person to help her do good marketing for her stock. Then, she's really excited to continue work with us by taking out her new loan to buy more stock. She sold a lot of kerosene and mirak stoves in her locality.

loans.use: To buy inventory for a clean energy business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries like rice, sugar, and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies and uniforms for his children.

loans.name: Famta Ndiaye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis novembre 2012.Il est composé de membres qui habitent le même quartier,elles ont comme activité principale le commerce
Fanta qui se trouve à gauche de la photo et levant le bras est la responsable du groupe,elle est âgée de 38 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 04 enfants.

Son activité est le commerce de chaussures,de vêtements .

Avec son prêt,elle compte acheter des chaussures pour une valeur de 75000f et des vêtements pour une valeur de 75000f.

Son objectif est d'aider son époux à supporter les charges familliales et de pouvoir subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en:
This group was created in November 2012. It is comprised of members who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is business. 

Fanta, who has her hand raised at the left of the photo, is in charge of the group. She is 38 years old, married, and the mother of four children. She sells women's shoes and clothing. With her loan, she plans on buying shoes for a value of 75,000 F and clothes for a value of 75,000F.

Her goal is to help her husband with the family expenses and to meet her needs.

loans.use: buy goods.

loans.name: Ry

texts.en:
Ry is 52 years old, married with five children, and lives in a rural village of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. To feed the family, she and her husband are dedicated to their farming business, primarily growing rice on their own farm. Farming business is their major source of income. 

Ry previously had two loans from HKL and she repaid them successfully. She is asking for a new loan to build a household latrine for the sake of her family members as she hasn't had a proper one before. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited, Ry is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine for the health of her family members.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married with 4 children. She is 63 years old and lives in Maribojoc, Tudela, Philippines.

Virginia is a farmer, and she grows coconut crops to earn a living. She has been doing this kind of work for 20 years. She has requested a loan to buy 20 sacks of fertilizer.

Virginia has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, she hopes to provide her family's basic needs and medical treatment.

loans.use: to buy 20 sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Maximeno

texts.en:
Maximeno is married with five children. Maximeno is 73 years old and lives in Lupagan, Clarin, Philippines.

Maximeno is a farmer and grows fish in a pond to earn a living. He has been doing this for 30 years. He has requested a loan to buy additional feed for his fishpond.

Maximeno has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Maximeno hopes to put aside savings for cases of emergencies.

loans.use: to buy additional feed for his fishpond business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of maize for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, sandstone, and blocks.

loans.name: Yerly Gihovana

texts.es:
Buenos días ella es yerly Gihovana , se encuentra estudiando en la institución educativa campo alto en el programa salud oral y entra a tercer semestre, quisiera solicitar el convenio con kiva ya que el núcleo familiar de ella se encuentra en una situación económica favorable y las cuotas no nos quedan muy altas, ellas viven juntas en un apartamento en arriendo, el padre murió cuando ella estaba pequeña y desde entonces la mama se ha hecho cargo de ella en todos los aspectos económicos, incluyendo los estudios y todas las necesidades básicas.
La mama trabaja como una operaria en una empresa de confección y el sueldo que tiene no alcanza para sostener la comida, arriendo, servicios, quiere acceder al convenio ya que con esto podría culminar los estudios de una manera satisfactoria ya que a ella le toca aplazar el primer semestre de practicas ya que no contaba con los recursos necesarios y se presento una época difícil económicamente ya que la mama se quedo sin trabajo y a ella le toco buscar un trabajo personal en  un restaurante como mesera para poder suplir los gastos de la casa.
Actualmente ella se encuentra sin trabajo y la mama es la que le paga campo alto, espera graduarse para poder colaborar con lo que necesitan en su hogar y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Hoy agradezco la oportunidad que se le esta dando para los estudios, ya que han tenido situaciones que realmente le afectan, luego de la muerte del padre se han dedicado a salir adelante con la mama a pesar de las dificultades y los pormenores que se le han presentado a ella y su mama.
texts.en:
Good day meet Yerly Gihovana. She is studying at Campo Alto in the Oral Health program, entering her third semester. She wants to request a loan from Kiva as her family is in a favorable financial situation and the installment fees are not high. They live in a rented apartment. 

Her father died when she was small and since then her mother has taken charge of everything financial, including education and basic necessities. Her mother works as an operator in a sewing company. Her salary isn't high enough to pay their food, rent and services. So a loan from Kiva would allow her to finish her studies in a satisfactory manner as she postponed her first semester of practicum due to lack of financial resources. 

Her mother was without work and Yerly had to find work, in a restaurant as a waitress to help with the household expenses. Now Yerly is without work and her mother is who is paying for her studies at Campo Alto. She hopes to graduate to help earn what is needed for her family and enjoy a better quality of living. 

Yerly is grateful for this opportunity offered her to finish her studies. She has had experiences which really affect her. After the death of her father she has dedicated herself to helping her mother get ahead in spite of the difficulties and particulars that have befallen her and her mom.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Lina Maria

texts.es:
Lina maría es una joven de 25 años de edad, quien a su corta edad es una mujer echada para adelante, desde que finalizo los estudios como bachiller en el año 2006, se ha desarrollado laboral mente en varios oficios, pero a pesar de que ha adquirido bastante experiencia laboral, siente que puede dar más de ella, y que el trabajo podría ser mejor recompensado si adquiere un titulo técnico en lo laboral. 
Desde que se graduó como bachiller, ha soñado con volver a un aula de clases, seguir aprendiendo  más cosas que son necesarias para la vida personal y laboral, sueña con poder brindarle a los hijos un mejor futuro ya que  sabe que el estudio es la mejor herencia que los padres pueden dejar a los hijos, y lo más importante, ser alguien de motivo y orgullo para ellos , por eso se encuentra decidida a luchar por los sueños y  hacerlos realidad con esfuerzo y dedicación.  
Ella desea continuar con los estudios y en algún momento ver recompensado todo el esfuerzo y sacrificio para tener una vejez digna, haber cumplido los sueños y ver que también se puedan cumplir los de los hijos 
Esta segura que con la ayuda de kiva para pagar el estudio, y la ayuda de Dios para que le de mucha sabiduría, es posible lograr hasta lo imposible.
texts.en:
Lina María is a 25-year-old young woman, who at her young age is a self-assured woman. Since graduating high school in 2006, she has worked in various offices, but despite gaining considerable work experience, she feels she can do more, and that she could earn a better income if she acquired a technical qualification in her field.

Since graduating high school, she has dreamed of going back to the classroom to continue learning more things that are necessary for personal and work life. She dreams of being able to offer her children a better future, as she knows that the best inheritance a parent can leave their children is an education, and most importantly, to be a role model and someone who they can be proud of. This is why she has decided to struggle to make her dreams come true with effort and dedication.

She wants to continue her studies and be rewarded for all the effort and sacrifice in order to have a dignified old age, having reached her dreams and be able to fulfill those of her children.

She is sure that with the help of Kiva to finance her studies, and the help of God for giving her wisdom, it is possible to achieve the impossible.

loans.use: to pay one semester of tuition.

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es tatiana, estudia un técnico en administración hotelería en  campo alto, escogió esta carrera porque le gusta, ya que es una profesión que requiere de estar a menudo en relación con las personas y de una u otra manera se aprende a tolerar, tener paciencia, ser persona y ser humano con la gente.  
Uno de los motivos fundamentales es querer salir adelante, tener un trabajo y una profesión digna, verse como una gran mujer profesional, llegar a donde quiere, y con grandes esfuerzos seguir estudiando, conocer más sobre lo que estudia, tener un mejor campo a nivel educativo, estar bien económicamente y personalmente.
El segundo motivo es la familia y los papas, que de una u otra manera la sacaron adelante y le enseñaron que lo que uno quiere, lo consigue con esfuerzo y es así como ella les puede agradecer todo lo que en el momento hicieron.
Siempre mantiene agradecida con aquellas personas que le dieron y aun le dan ánimo, que la felicitan y le suben la moral cuando lo necesita, que la apoyaron desde el primer momento que empezó a estudiar y estaban con ella cuando lo necesitaba, es una chica que como todos tiene sueños, aspiraciones, metas y propuestas, quiere alcanzar esas metas  y no se detiene,  cada día se  enamora más de la carrera y se levanta con ánimo para lograr lo que quiere ser y obtener lo que quiere de la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Tatiana studies the career of hotel administration in Campo Alto. She chose this career, because she likes interacting with other people and in a way one learns to be tolerant, patient and personable with others. One of her main goals is to be able to support herself, have a good job and a respectable profession. In some years she would like to become a professional woman, reach her goals, and with great effort continue studying so that she learns more, has a better educational level and does well financially and personally. 
Her second reason is to show her appreciation to her family and parents, who supported her and taught her that with effort one can achieve whatever one wants. She is always grateful to those people, who encouraged and still encourage her, who congratulate her and raise her moral, who supported her from the beginning of her studies and were there with her when she needed it. She is a girl with many dreams and goals, who wants to achieve those objectives and does not stop. She loves her profession and starts her day with the energy to achieve all that she wants to be and get it in the best possible way.

loans.use: To pay a semester's tuition

loans.name: Blanca Nuvia

texts.es:
Ella es  blanca nuvia, es una mujer de 46 años, estuvo trabajando como operaria en una empresa de inyección y soplado, después de 11 años de laborar allí, se dio cuenta que por más que ella se esforzara en el trabajo los superiores no valoraban la entrega y dedicación. 
Buscando la manera de cambiar esta forma de vida, forjo un sueño en el corazón, deseando que estos valores los aprovechara ella y la familia, por eso hoy en día quiere estudiar para crear la propia empresa de confección. 
El sueño que ella tiene a futuro es tener estabilidad económica, calidad de vida, tiempo para la familia y poder ser un punto de apoyo dando empleo a otras personas. 
Durante el primer semestre de estudio, aprendió mucho y con esfuerzo pudo comprar dos máquinas, con estas maquinas  inicio en la casa un taller de Diseño y Confección donde ha adquirido experiencia, clientes satisfechos y nuevos desafíos. 
La idea para el futuro es terminar la carrera profesional, por eso busca el apoyo solicitando el subsidio con kiva para apoyar a personas que como ella quieren triunfar y lograr las metas. 

Agradezco toda la atención y colaboración.
texts.en:
Blanca Nuvia is a 46-year-old woman.  She was working as an operator in a business that does injection molding and blow molding of plastics.  After 11 years working there, she realized that for as much effort as she put forward in the job her superiors didn’t value her devotion and dedication.

Looking for the way to change her way of life, she gave shape to a dream in her heart, wanting to put those values to good use for herself and her family.  That's why these days she wants to study to create her own tailoring business.  Her dream of the future is to have financial stability, quality of life, time for her family and to be able to be a place of support by providing employment to other people. 

During the first semester of her studies, she learned a lot and with effort she was able to buy two sewing machines.  With these machines she started a workshop for design and tailoring in her house where she has acquired experience, satisfied clients and new challenges.

Her idea for the future is to finish her professional courses.  For that she is looking for support, requesting the loan from Kiva in order to support people like her who want to triumph and achieve their goals.  She is grateful for all of the kindness and help.

loans.use: to pay for a semester’s tuition.

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy eligió diseño y confección de modas porque es la pasión que ella tiene, desde toda la vida le ha gustado la moda, sin darse cuenta que le gustaba tanto.
Ella siempre ha querido luchar por los sueños, y este es el primer paso, quiere en un futuro poder tener una empresa de modas que sea reconocida en todo el mundo, aunque ella tiene una pequeña discapacidad, ella siente que no la tiene, ya que aunque le impide hacer muchas cosas no le importa, porque ella se siente como una persona normal y capaz de hacer todo.
Siente que el convenio con kiva le ayudaría mucho, ya que el dinero que ahorra le ayudaría a pagar los medicamentos y citas medicas. La familia para ella es lo mas importante en el mundo, sin ella no seria nada, es un motor en la vida de ella, y quiere salir adelante no solo para tener un buen futuro si no para ayudarlos a ellos en lo que necesiten, la familia siempre sera una parte importante en la vida de ella.
Espera tener un gran futuro y sabe que lo lograra, se imagina poder llegar a las mejores pasarelas del mundo, y poder ayudar a quien lo necesite, ella sabe que algún día todos los sueños que tiene se  harán realidad.
texts.en:
Leidy chose fashion design and clothing because it is what she is passionate about.  She has liked fashion her whole life, without realizing that she liked it as much as she does.  She has always wanted to reach for her dreams and this is the first step.  In the future, she would like to have a fashion line that is recognized all over the world.  Although she has a small disability, she feels as if she does not have one.  While it prevents her from doing many things, it does not matter because she feels like a normal person and capable of doing anything.

She feels that the agreement with Kiva would help her a lot, because the money she saves would help her to pay for medications and doctors appointments.  For her, family is the most important thing in the world - without it, there would be nothing.  It is the engine in her life.  She wants to get ahead not only to have a good future, but also to be able to help them in whatever they need.  Family will always be an important part of her life.  

Leidy hopes to have a big future and she knows that she will achieve her goal.  She imagines being able to arrive at the best fashion runways of the world, and not only that, she hopes to be able to help those in need.  She knows that one day, all her dreams will come true.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of enrollment.

loans.name: Yurany

texts.es:
Su nombre es Yurany,  es una mujer de 29 años de edad, tiene una niña de siete años, vive con el compañero sentimental  Jairo hace nueve años, trabaja como agente de atención al cliente en una empresa de turismo.

Desde la época de colegio soñó con la idea de realizar una carrera universitaria , pero por los bajos recursos económicos  debió trabajar, al graduarse de bachiller  tuvo que seguir trabajando para ayudar a los padres en las obligaciones del hogar. 
Luego de dos años nació la hija Juanita , motivo por el cual debió suspender las actividades y tomar la decisión de brindarle un hogar.

 Ahora después de varios años tiene un trabajo estable y le gustaría continuar con el  sueño de realizar una carrera. 

Para ella, una de las pasiones ha sido el turismo y quiere realizar una de las mayores  metas, tener la propia empresa de servicios turísticos, ya que piensa que al ofrecer un viaje a un pasajero no solo esta ofreciendo un producto, también le esta  dando la posibilidad de que esa persona también pueda realizar el sueño que tenga. 

Por esta razón y después de revisar muchas opciones y esperar varios años para continuar con expectativas estudiantiles, tomo la decisión de incorporase en Campo Alto ya que considero que era la mejor elección  para capacitarse y cumplir la meta,en tres  años tener la propia empresa de turismo,así mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia, ofrecer un  mejor futuro a la hija y por supuesto seguir ofreciendo el país donde ella nació como uno de los paraísos que toda persona en el mundo debe conocer.
texts.en:
This is Yurany. She is 29 years old and has a seven-year-old daughter. She has been living with her live-in partner Jairo for nine years. She works as a customer service representative in a tourism office.

Since her school days she has dreamed of completing a university degree but because of low economic resources she had to work. After graduating from high school she had to continue working to help her parents with household obligations. Two years later her daughter Juanita was born which was why she had to put her activities on hold and make a decision of providing her a home. Now, after several years, she has a stable job and she would like to continue with her dream of completing a degree. 

For her, one of her passions has been tourism and she wants to fulfil one of her biggest goals, to have her own tourism business, as she believes offering a trip to clients isn’t only about offering them a product but also giving them the possibility that they can also fulfill their dreams. 

For this reason and after reviewing many options and waiting several years to continue with student prospects, she made the decision of registering at CampoAlto. She considered this to be the best choice to train and complete her goal of having her own tourism business in three years thus improving the quality of her family’s life, offering her daughter a better future and of course providing the country where she was born as a paradise that everyone in the world should know.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Miryam Mercedes

texts.es:
Ella  es Miryam Mercedes  tiene 33 años de edad es madre de tres niñas, vive en la localidad de Suba, actualmente estudia cosmetología y estética integral entra a Tercer semestre.
El objetivo a corto plazo es poder obtener más conocimientos y experiencia en esta etapa de la carrera, para así mismo poder culminar los estudios.
A mediano plazo quiere trabajar en lo que le gusta, que es la estética  y seguir obteniendo experiencia, a largo plazo poder crear el propia spa.
El estar estudiando estética le permite poder brindarle a la familia una calidad de vida socio económica mejor.
De esta manera para el estado personal le ayuda a realizarse como persona para obtener un futuro mejor junto a la familia.
En la familia se sienten orgullosos por el logro que ella tiene que es poder estar estudiando.
A ellos les da las gracias por el apoyo en esta etapa de la vida, necesita el convenio porque quiere seguir y culminar los estudios, pues no tiene un trabajo estable, el trabajo es como independiente vendiendo ropa.
Cuando termine el programa quiere seguir especializándose, ya que la salud estética facial y corporal de muchas personas estarán en las manos de ella.
texts.en:
Miryam Mercedes is 33 years old and is the mother of three girls. She lives in the locality of Suba. She is currently studying cosmetology and comprehensive aesthetics and is entering her third semester. The short term objective is to be able to obtain more knowledge and experience in this stage of the degree to be able to finish her studies. In the medium term, she wants to work in what she enjoys which is aesthetics and to continue gaining experience. Her long term goal is to be able to have her own spa. 

To be studying aesthetics allows her to be able to afford her family a better socioeconomic status. In this way, for her personal state, it helps her to fulfill herself as a person to be able to obtain a better future together with her family. Her family feels proud of her success which she has in being able to study. She thanks them for their support in this stage of her life. She needs the loan because she wants to continue and finish her studies. While she doesn't have a stable job, she works independently selling clothes. When she finishes the program, she wants to continue specializing now that the aesthetic facial and bodily health of many people will be in her hands.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of enrollment.

loans.name: Beatriz  Adriana

texts.es:
La señora adriana entro a estudiar a esta institución para capacitarse y superar las expectativas que tiene acerca de la carrera que ha escogido. Le parece una oportunidad para aprovechar, tanto por la facilidad de horarios, oportunidad de pagos y fortalecimiento de aprendizaje. 

Los proyectos son verse como empresaria, crecer como persona, intelectual y laboral mente, siente que esto la lleva a los sueños que tiene.
Brindar oportunidad de trabajo a otros, tener otras oportunidades, ve en kiva, la facilidad de poder estudiar, abrir nuevos horizontes junto con campo alto, es una muy buena alianza o acuerdo, adriana agradece por pensar en las personas de bajos recursos para poder pagar los estudios.
Como proyecto en el estudio, puede ver a la familia trabajar en unidad, puede recomendar la institución para que estudien también. 
Los hijos que están prontos a terminar los estudios, también tiene proyectos de ser independientes y apoyar a otros.
La felicidad de aprender es genial, espera culminar y cumplir con las expectativas que tiene.
texts.en:
Señora Adriana came to study in this school to be trained and fulfill the hopes she has for the major that she has chosen.  It seems like a good opportunity for her to take advantage of, thanks to the accessible schedule, payment options, and the strengthening of her learning.

The projects deal with entrepreneurship and intellectual growth as a person, as well as in your work life.  She feels that this will help her fulfill her dreams: having more opportunities and offering work opportunities to others.

She sees in Kiva a chance to be able to study with ease.  Together with Campo Alto, they are opening up new horizons.  It is a very good partnership or agreement.  She is grateful to lenders for thinking of people with limited resources, and for allowing them to be able to pay for their studies.

As was planned in the study, she can see the family working together; she can recommend the school to them so that they study there, too.

The children who are about to finish their studies also have projects to be more independent and to support others.

The happiness that comes from learning is fantastic.  She hopes to finish up and see her hopes come alive.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's registration

loans.name: Claudia Milena

texts.es:
La niña Claudia Milena hace conocimiento del interés que tiene en estudiar auxiliar de enfermería en el instituto técnico Campo alto, pero no tiene las condiciones para poder pagar el valor normal de la cuota mensual ya que la madre trabaja en ayudante de cocina y gana un sueldo menor del mínimo, a parte de lo que tiene que pagar de comida y servicios el padre no le colabora con el estudio de auxiliar de enfermería.
Claudia Milena tiene el interés de estudiar auxiliar de enfermería porque es una carrera que le ha gustado desde pequeña y tiene familiares que también estudiaron enfermería.
texts.en:
Claudia Milena is interested in studying to be a nurse's assistant at the Campo Alto Technical Institute, but she does not have the resources to pay the typical monthly costs. Her mother works as a kitchen assistant and earns less than minimum wage, and must pay for food and services. Her father is not helping with her going to school to be a nurse's assistant.

Claudia Milena is interested in studying to be a nurse's assistant because it is a career that she has liked since she was young and she has family members who have also studied nursing.

loans.use: to pay school fees for a semester.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
BENKADI est un groupe de l’association BALIMAYA de N’TENTOU. Il regroupe 5 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne cinq enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente d’habillements  à l’image de SAMADIE  qui est la première personne debout de la gauche vers la droite de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à N’TENTOU dans la Préfecture de KATI (Région de KOULIKORO, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat  vente d’habillements : pagne wax, balle de friperie etc.
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur deuxième  prêt solidaire. 
SAMADIE, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à  NTENTOU, excelle dans la vente d’habillements. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 pièces de pagne wax, de 1 balle de friperie.  Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako et sur place auprès des grossistes  et vend ses produits à  OUELESSEBOUGOU en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle mixte.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000FCFA  somme qui lui  
permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité de commerce d’habillements.
texts.en:
Benkadi is a group of the Balimaya de N’tentou association. It is composed of five women who know each other as relatives and neighbors. On the average, they are 41 years old. Married, with five children on the average, they are engaged in various business activities, such as buying and reselling clothing. This is what Samadie does, for example. She is the first one standing from left to right in the photo. They live in traditional extended families in N’tentou in the Kati prefecture (Koulikoro Region, the Republic of Mali).
They have been working as vendors for some years and have a lot of customers. They buy and sell clothing: traditional wax “pagnes fabric,” bales of second-hand clothing etc. With the goal of meeting growing customer demand, the group members have decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their second solidarity loan.

Samadie, who is the group leader and well known in Ntentou, excels in selling clothing. She plans to use her loan to buy five sets of traditional wax “pagnes” fabric and one bale of second-hand clothing. She stocks up from wholesalers in Bamako and locally, and sells in Ouelessebougou, retail, for cash and on credit, to a mixed clientele. She hopes to earn a monthly income of 30,000 West African francs, which will allow her to repay the loan and reinvest in her clothing business.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Sandra Liliana

texts.es: Ella es Sandra Liliana, ella  tiene 17  años, vive con la mamá y la abuelita   en  el   Barrio   Santa    Lucia,   ella   se   graduó  de bachillerato  en  el  año  2013, en  esto  momento ella quiere estudiar  cocina, para lo  cual ella   ha  averiguado  en institutos para  estudiar  cocina,  y encontró  a Campo  Alto,  el  cual  le  ofrece  un  buen  pensum  académico,  ella  cuenta con todo el apoyo de la  mamá, la cual es la que le da  todo  el apoyo para ella  poder salir   adelante, ella  escogió el  curso  de cocina, porque  le  gusta,  porque  quiere  ampliar el conocimientos en el arte de la cocina,  porque  quiere  al  terminar  el  curso,  poder tener la oportunidad de trabajar en uno de los restaurantes  más prestigiosos  de  Bogotá,  y  así  afianzar  los   conocimientos adquiridos  en la formación en Campo Alto, ella quiere  poder conseguir  la  ayuda del convenio Kiva, porque el perfil puede ser  consultado no solo en Colombia, sino a nivel mundial, lo cual le abriría   muchas  oportunidades  en  el futuro  y  esto la puede llegar a convertir una de las mejores  chef,  y  así  poder tener el propio restaurante.
texts.en:
This is Sandra Liliana. She is 17 years old and lives with her mother and grandmother in the neighborhood of Santa Lucia. Sandra graduated from high school in 2013. At the moment, she wants to study cooking, so she would like to explore this field at a culinary institute. This is how she discovered CampoAlto, which offers a good academic curriculum.

Sandra has the full support of her mother, who tries to give her all the assistance that she can so that she can get ahead. She chose the cooking program because she enjoys that subject, but she also wants to expand her knowledge in the culinary arts. Upon finishing the program, Sandra would like to have the opportunity to work at one of the more prestigious restaurants in Bogota. Her chances will be strengthened with the knowledge she acquires through the training at CampoAlto.

Sandra would like to secure assistance from Kiva because her profile will not only be seen in Colombia, but also on a worldwide level. This will help open many opportunities for her in the future as she goes down the path to becoming one of the best chefs and being able to open her own restaurant.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Kevin Horlando

texts.es:
Es un joven llamado kevin, es muy soñador con mucho espíritu de superación deseoso de estudiar medicina por que anhela poder servir a las personas, acaba de graduarse de bachiller y además durante el año 2013 curso dos semestres en auxiliar de enfermería en la institución campo alto. 
El nombre es kevin y por ser menor de edad en este momento depende económicamente de los padres, desea seguir adelante con las prácticas para poder recibir el titulo y poderse desenvolver en alguna ocupación referente a la carrera.
Debido a la situación económica del hogar y teniendo  en cuenta que tiene dos hermanos menores de edad que se encuentran estudiando le gustaría obtener el convenio que ofrece kiva para el descuento en la pensión mensual de las practicas.
texts.en:
Kevin is a young man who is very determined to improve his situation and study medicine so he can serve people.  He just graduated from high schoool and throughout the year 2013 he took two semesters in nursing auxiliary studies at the Campo Alto Institute.

Kevin is a minor at this time and depends economically on his parents.  He wants to continue with his studies in order to graduate and get a job in something related to his career.

Due to the economic situation at home, and the fact that he has two minor siblings who are in school, he wants to receive the loan Kiva is offering to cover part of the monthly tuition of his studies.

loans.use: To pay semester tuition.

loans.name: Dayanne

texts.es:
Ella es una joven llamada dayanne bella, glamurosa, tierna, con tan buenos sentimientos dedicada a las cosas pero también con grandes expectativas que la llevan a querer cumplir un gran sueño, que con esfuerzo y logros quiere llegar a este objetivo primordial para iniciar un nuevo reto, ya que ha pasado por varios retos, como el  de trabajar como una persona  por el que pasan las horas y horas pero con un toque especial, el de la paciencia la mesura y la dedicación, logra que pase el tiempo sin sentirse agotada o impaciente, ella  es tan fuerte  que hace que nada de esto importe, pues el camino lo tiene bien claro el  ver la belleza y la esencia de las personas con el autoestima muy alto, que se sientan bien físicamente y emocionalmente es el gran sueño, porque tiene el don en las manos de hacer las cosas mejores y de hacer que chicas, chicos, señoras y señores se sientan personas que quieren un cambio para la vida, pues ella es quien quiere que  con la belleza natural de  estos bellos  seres humanos tengan oportunidades, como la de ella de cumplir una meta en un nuevo trabajo una carrera y muchas más. 
Esta joven hoy está cumpliendo aquel objetivo de  tener el propio spa a triunfado a ganado a tenido el merito de hacer lo que realmente quiere, logrando el cambio y perspectiva de los demás para cambiar el camino de muchas vidas, a puesto la huella y quiere dejarla, para que con esa armonía y aquella voluntad de querer poder triunfar de esforzarse realmente por lo que se quiere, que aquellos triunfos o sueños por cumplir no se queden enfrascados y guardados, ella quiere el logro y el objetivo cumplido por lo que cada quien debe luchar independiente de la edad, si es bajito si es gordo  si es muy alto o que cree que no tiene posibilidades o del estado en el que se encuentre en el momento. 
Hoy quiere oportunidad y retos  que sean modernos y que ofrezcan el cambio en nuestro diario vivir, en cada una del arte en que la persona sea buena. 
El de ella es este, la belleza  y la estética con el que se quedo y con el que lucha constantemente, con el convenio que kiva le ofrece ella puede terminar la carrera que tanta alegría le da, y a si ayudaría un poco en la comodidad y en los pagos que ella tiene que hacer.
texts.en:
Dayanne is a young woman who is beautiful, glamorous, affectionate, with such good feelings dedicated to things but with great expectations. These expectations have lead her to want to achieve her big dream. With effort and success she wants to arrive at this essential objective in order to start a new challenge. She has already been through several challenges, such as working as a person for whom pass hours and hours. But with a special touch, that of patience, moderation and dedication, she manages to make time pass without feeling exhausted or impatient. She is so strong that she makes none of that matter. Her path is very clear to her - seeing the beauty and the essence of people with high self esteem. That they feel well physically and emotionally is the big dream, because she has the gift in her hands of making things better and making girls, boys, men and women feel like people who want a change for life. She is the one who wants, with their natural beauty, these beautiful human beings to have opportunities like her to achieve a goal in a new job, a career and much more.

This young woman has achieved her objective of having her own spa. She has succeeded, won and had the advantage of doing what she really wants - managing the change and perspective of others in order to change the paths of many lives. She has made tracks and wants to leave them, so that with this harmony and her willingness she can succeed in really strengthening herself through what is really wanted, that those successes or dreams to be achieved don't stay around and put away, she wants the success and a completed objective by what each one must fight independent of age, if they're short, or fat, or very tall, or they don't believe they have any chance, or independent of the state they are currently in.

Today she wants opportunities and challenges that are modern and offer change in our daily lives, all involving the skill of people's well-being. Hers is this, the beauty and the aesthetic with which you are left and with which you fight constantly. With the agreement that Kiva offers her she can complete the career that makes her so happy, and it would help her to be a little more comfortable and with the payments she has to make.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's tuition.

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
Ha de comenzar con la historia de un joven llamado jose Alexander que sabe que los objetivos son altos, al igual que slos deseos de alcanzarlos. Aun así, él sabe que no todo es fácil, que hay escalones que deben ser superados con mayor esfuerzo y que todo, absolutamente todo, tiene el  lugar y el momento adecuado.
A través del espíritu de joven  luchador ha logrado metas que se ha propuesto y ha aprendido que las mejores cosas son las que se logran con trabajo por medio de habilidades propias.
 Este chico actualmente convive independientemente ya que no es oriundo de la cuidad y por lo tanto debe trabajar para sostener el bienestar. 
El afecto por estudiar mercadeo y ventas proviene desde hace unos meses, cuando en el trabajo diario fue descubriendo cualidades y actitudes que quizá no sabía que tenía. Actualmente trabaja de auxiliar en una tienda   y sabe que la comunicación debe ser adecuada en cuanto a la atención a los clientes, vendedores y, aún más, al equipo de trabajo. A razón de él, ha desarrollado estrategias con el consentimiento de los superiores para que todo en la mayoría funcione de la mejor manera posible.
Quizá estudiar mercadeo y ventas sea unos de los primeros pasos para encontrar un punto de apoyo y establecer una base vital para los proyectos y deseos de superación, y para eso le pareció importante el apoyo que se está presentando con el convenio de kiva, ya que se disminuyen las mensualidades y se economiza algo de dinero.
No hay nada más agradable que poder demostrar que se puede salir adelante con la frente en alto y con el orgullo de sentir que lo que se ha logrado nadie se lo ha regalado, sino que todo es fruto de deseos, educación y esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Let us begin with the story of a young man named Jose Alexander who knows that he has goals that are as high as his desire to achieve them. Even so, he knows that nothing is easy, that there are obstacles that must be overcome through great effort and that everything, absolutely everything, has its appropriate time and place.

Through his fighting spirit, this youth has achieved the objectives he has set himself and learned that the best things are those that one achieves through one’s own work and skills.

Currently this boy lives independently because he is not a native of the city and he needs to work to support himself.

His attraction to studying merchandising and sales arose a few months ago, when he discovered, while at his daily job, that he had qualities and attitudes that perhaps he was unaware of.   

Currently he works as a shop’s assistant and knows the importance of communication when he handles customers, merchants and, most all, the work team. Because of this, he has developed strategies, with the consent of his supervisors, so that everything functions, overall, in the best way possible.

Perhaps studying merchandising and sales will be one of the first steps he takes to find support and establish a vital basis for his projects and desires to succeed. Consequently, it seemed to him that the support offered by Kiva was important because it lowered his monthly costs and helped him save money.

There is nothing nicer than being able to demonstrate that one can get ahead with one’s head held high and with the pride of feeling that what one has achieved has not been a gift but rather the result of one’s desire, education and effort.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Julieth

texts.es:
Ella es julieth, nació el 2 de abril, la mama es madre cabeza de familia vive en bogota, es una chica que quiere estudiar lo que ama y así poder ayudarle a la  mama ya que julieth es la mayor de los 5 hermanos pues ella se paga el estudio y responde así mismo por la casa y por los deberes. 
Ella tiene la ilusión de poder  culminar los estudios,  ella siempre ha luchado por lo que quiere y pues en este momento requiere nuevamente de la colaboración de kiva para así continuar formando un país, camino de mejoras y de sueños,  así mismo brindar una ayuda como enfermera.
texts.en:
This is Julieth. She was born on April 2. Her mother is head of household. She lives in Bogota. She is a girl who wants to study what she loves and thus be able to help her mother because she is the oldest of five siblings and pays for her own studies and helps with the house and housework.

She dreams of being able to finish her studies. She has always struggled for what she wants and thus, at this time, she needs help again from Kiva so that she can continue her training, on her path toward improvement and realizing her dreams, and providing help as a nurse for her country.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Angie  Constanza

texts.es:
Ella es   Angie Constanza, tiene 19 años,  ya se graduó de bachiller el año pasado, gracias a Dios, porque es algo que anhelaba, es una persona que es muy buena compañera, es disciplinada, sociable y le gusta primero pensar bien antes de hacer o decir las cosas.
Es una persona que le gusta hacer las cosas con amor y bien hechas, es una persona creadora, ha tenido durante toda la vida, algunos inconvenientes de salud, pero siempre ha salido adelante gracias al apoyo de todas las personas que la rodean.


Quiere estudiar el programa AUXILIAR EN ADMINISTRACIÓN EMPRESARIAL, porque le llama mucho la atención, porque va a aprender sobre la organización de una empresa, manejar los procesos de la misma, organizar los eventos que se hacen para promoverla y también por ende todo lo relacionado con servicio al cliente, todo esto pensando en a futuro realizar el sueño de ella, tener la propia empresa y un Colegio, el convenio con kiva seria una ayuda muy grande para ella, seria un apoyo para poder terminar la carrera para así mismo poderle  ayudar a la comunidad y así  hacer una mejor sociedad.
texts.en:
This is Angie Constanza.  She is 19 years old and graduated from high school last year, fortunately because it was something she was eagerly hoping for.  She is a great classmate, disciplined, sociable, and she likes to think well before doing or saying things.  

Angie is someone that likes to do things with love and do them well.  She is a creative person.  Her entire life, she has suffered from health problems, but thanks to God and the people that surround her, she has always come out on top.  

Angie wants to study in the program AUXILIARY in BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION.  She is interested in this program because she will learn about the organization of a business, its management processes, business marketing through promotional events, and through this, everything connected to customer service.  With all this in mind, she hopes to fulfill her dream of having her own business and a school.  The agreement with Kiva would be a great help for her.  The loan would provide support to be able to finish her academic studies and therefore be able to help her community and help make a better society.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is married with one son. He is 33 years old and lives in Silucap, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Edgar owns a simple house and plans to renovate it. He has requested a loan for PHP 35,000 to purchase plywood and nails for his house renovation.

Edgar is a new member of PMPC. In the future, he hopes to have a concrete house.

loans.use: to purchase plywood and nails for his house renovation.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julian es maestro ebanista garantiza las distintas etapas de fabricación: elección del modelo y la madera, aserrado y soldadura, realización del ensamblaje, del decorado y el montaje. Las cómodas, consolas, escritorios, mesas de despacho y otros muebles cubiertos de escamas, de madera para chapar, marquetería, laca, barniz, porcelana son muebles de ebanistería. El acabado del mueble a veces se confía a un artesano especializado: taraceador, montador en bronces, escultor sobre madera, dorador, barnizador

El vive en casa propia  en el Departamento de La Paz, aproximadamente a media hora del centro de la ciudad de La Paz.

El sueño de Julian es construir su propio taller al servicio de todo el publico en general. Asi mejoar sus ingresos y calidad de vida.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera  vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Julian is a master cabinetmaker in charge of various stages in their manufacture including the choice of model pattern and wood, sawing and welding, construction, doing the decor, and their assembly. He makes chests of drawers, side tables, desks, and other furniture covered with shingles. He also does veneering, marquetry, lacquer, and porcelain in his workshop. He sometimes entrusts the final touches on the cabinet to another skilled artisan to add braze, wooden sculptures, gilded accents, and more.

He lives in his own home in the Department of La Paz, about a half hour from downtown La Paz. 

Julian's dream is to build his own studio to serve the entire public to improve his income and quality of life.

This is his first loan from IMPRO and his first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to construct a cabinetmaker's workshop.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a 49-year-old married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 12 years to 24 years. She describes herself to be ambitious. 

She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, cooking fat, eggs and other items. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a strategic place, and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock. 

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, milk and other items. This will enable her to have enough stock for resale. 

Her business goal is to own a wholesale shop within five years. This is her sixth loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, bread, milk and other items.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy additional computer parts and supplies needed in her computer shop. Her loan also helped not just in her business but in the education of her child. Her income from the business is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs. She also has a direct selling business for additional income. 

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan for her to buy additional computer parts and supplies needed in her business.  Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and the educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Paulina hopes to be successful in her business and dreams to have her dream house. She meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis.  A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners.  The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional computer parts and supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Jessica  Yusbreidy

texts.es:
Jessica  es una niña de 14 años que cursaba grado  9,  le toca aplazar el estudio  por cuestión de que quedo embarazada a temprana edad,  pero en la mente nunca el deseo de salir a delante se quedó atrás, espero un largo año que  la  hija creciera un poco más, quería  terminar los estudios y graduarse para así poder brindarle un buen futuro a la hija.
Terminando los estudios a los 17 años, se coloco como meta los estudios en universidad, pero por  falta de tiempo no había podido ingresar, la  hija todavía estaba pequeña y  a al cuidado de ella nada más. 
Ahora a los 19 años ingreso  a un trabajo estable donde la  facilidad de horarios le da el tiempo suficiente junto a la hija y facilidades de horarios para estudiar, encontró en campo alto la oportunidad  de estudiar, ya que en el instituto le brindan  la facilidad de horario que le exigían en el trabajo, en este momento la meta para el futuro es graduarse de campo alto en atención a la primera infancia y así poder tener  superación académica  y poder dedicar más tiempo  a lo que siempre le ha gustado.  
El convenio que ofrece campo alto con kiva seria de gran ayuda para ella ya que ella es la que sola se paga el estudio y el valor de las cuotas mensuales es un poco costoso, con el dinero que ella se podría ahorrar en el pago de la cuota mensual lo puede invertir en las cosas que le pidan en el estudio y en la hija.
texts.en:
Jessica was a 14-year-old girl who attended school up to the 9th grade.  She had to postpone her studies because she got pregnant at a young age but in her mind she had never left behind the desire to get ahead.  She waited a long year so that her daughter could grow a little more.  She wanted to finish her studies and graduate so that she could provide a good future for her daughter.  Finishing school at age 17, she had placed for herself the goal of studying in a university but for lack of time she hadn’t been able to enter as her daughter was still young and she couldn't do much more than care for her.

Now, at age 19, she landed a stable job where the ease of her schedule gives her enough time with her daughter and also makes it easy for her to study.  She found in Campo Alto the opportunity to study as in the institute they offered her a schedule that fits with what her work requires.  At this time her goal for the future is to graduate from Campo Alto in early childhood care and thus be able to improve academically and be able to dedicate more time to what she has always liked. 

The agreement that Campo Alto is offering with Kiva would be of great help to her as she is the only one who pays for her studies and the value of the monthly installments is a little costly.  With the money that she could save in the payment of her monthly installments she can invest in the things that her studies and her daughter require from her.

loans.use: to pay for a semester’s tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wholesale fish.

loans.name: 03.05.14 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Minh is the group leader of the 03.05.14 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of three members.  Minh is applying for a loan to purchase general things and dry food for resale. She has a retail business selling general things and dry food and has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Minh is 40 years old and married with three children. She lives with three dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Minh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Minh hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase general things and dry food for resale

loans.name: 06.09.01 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Nam is the group leader of the 06.09.01 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of four members. Nam operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell and she has been involved in this business for five years. Nam is 38 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Nam joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nam has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Nam faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Nam hopes for her children to do well in school, to build a new house, and for her business to do well.

Trong gia đình chị có 02 người sống phụ thuộc

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Irenea

texts.en:
This is Irenea, 41, resident of Taguig, Philippines. She is married to Michael, a welder, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating a business. Irenea is working hard to provide income for their everyday expenses.

Irenea operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a small amount of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns an income by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

She is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to help her continue the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Irenea hopes to have a grocery store someday and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries, and beverages

loans.name: Nicodem

texts.es:
Nicodem Yonathan brinda sus servicios de internet y venta de CD.

El vive en casa de sus padres en Z/ Lagunas 21 de Septiembre Av. Primavera Nº 2045 , del Departamento de La Paz, aproximadamente a media hora del centro de la ciudad de La Paz.

El sueño de Nicodem Yonathan es incrementar su capital y en un presente abrir un mini cine para todo el publico en general. Asi mejoar sus ingresos y calidad de vida para su familia.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera  vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Nicodem Yonathan offers internet services and sells CDs.

He lives in his parents' house at 2045 Primavera Avenue in the September 21 Lakes Zone, Department of La Paz, approximately a half-hour from the center of the city of La Paz.

Nicodem Yonathan's dream is to increase his internet cafe's working capital and, soon, to open a mini-theater to show movies to the general public. This should improve his income and his family's quality of life.

This is the 1st time he has requested a loan through IMPRO from Kiva.

loans.use: to increase working capital in his internet cafe and to open a mini-theater for the general public.

loans.name: Siguidia Group

texts.fr:
